subject: Magia Record Released!
text:
Thank you for downloading Magia Record!

We are pleased to announce that the English version of Magia Record Puella Magi Madoka Magica [Side Story] was officially released on June 25th.

We're currently preparing tons of events, content, and updates for you to enjoy!
Be sure to check for updates in-game, or on any of the following official websites/accounts.

--------------------
▼Official site
https://magiarecord-en.com/
▼Official Facebook Page
https://www.facebook.com/MagiaRecordEN/
▼Official twitter account
https://twitter.com/magiarecorden

We appreciate your support and hope you continue to enjoy Magia Record Puella Magi Madoka Magica [Side Story]!

subject: The Pre-Registration Campaigns Were a Success!
text:
Thank you for downloading Magia Record!

We reached over 25,000 pre-registered players during the Pre-Registration Campaigns! Thanks to all of you for making these campaigns an incredible success!

We will be sending Homura Akemi (Glasses) and 200 Magia Stones to all players who clear Chapter 1 Episode 2 Battle 2 of the Main Story.

・Homura Akemi (Glasses) can be received from the Homura Akemi (Glasses) Shop.
・The Magia Stones will be sent at 12:00 AM PDT, the day after first starting the game.

Notes

・The contents of this campaign are subject to change without notice.

We appreciate your support and hope you continue to enjoy Magia Record Puella Magi Madoka Magica [Side Story]!

subject: The Magical Girl CM Campaigns Were a Success!
text:
Thank you for downloading Magia Record!

We reached the goal of all six pre-release Magical Girl CM Campaigns!
Thanks to all of you for making these campaigns an incredible success!

We will be sending 300 Magia Stones to all players who clear Chapter 1 Episode 2 Battle 2 of the Main Story.

・The Magia Stones will be sent at 12:00 am pdt, the day after first starting the game.


Notes

・The contents of this campaign are subject to change without notice.

We appreciate your support and hope you continue to enjoy Magia Record Puella Magi Madoka Magica [Side Story]!

subject: Release Celebration Login Bonus Begins!
text:
Thank you for downloading Magia Record!

Login Bonuses celebrating the release of Magia Record Puella Magi Madoka Magica [Side Story] started.

Log in each day to receive the Home Screen Outfit for Iroha (Swimsuit).

Release Celebration Login Bonus

■ Duration

6/25/2019 to 7/9/2019 11:59 PM PDT

■ Content

In addition to the regular Login Bonus, log in every day during the event to receive the following Presents.
x1

Release Celebration
Medal

x10

Magia Stones


Log in 12 out of 15 days to receive a maximum of
・12 Release Celebration Medals
・120 Magia Stones

※The above amounts will not be obtainable should you not login a total of 12 days.

Shop (Release Celebration Medals)

Release Celebration Medals can be exchanged for the limited edition Home Screen Outfit for Iroha (Swimsuit) and other items at the Shop.

■ Duration

6/25/2019 to 7/9/2019 11:59 PM PDT

■ Content

Items available at the Shop are as follows.
・10 Release Celebration Medals: Home Screen Outfit for Iroha (Swimsuit)
・5 Release Celebration Medals: Fate Weave Ticket
・3 Release Celebration Medals: 1 AP Potion
・1 Release Celebration Medal: 10,000 Curse Chips

Important

・Release Celebration Medals cannot be used once the Shop has closed. Please be sure to use all your Medals while the Shop is still open.
・All unused Medals will be lost at the end of the event. Don't miss your chance to use them!
・The event schedule and contents are subject to change without notice.
・The Home Screen Outfit for Iroha (Swimsuit) may be available again at a later date.

Thank you for your understanding.

We appreciate your support and hope you continue to enjoy Magia Record Puella Magi Madoka Magica [Side Story]!

subject: Mitama's Special Training - Iroha Tamaki
text:
Thank you for downloading Magia Record!

The limited time event, Mitama's Special Training - Iroha Tamaki began on 6/25.

Mitama's Special Training - Iroha Tamaki

■ Event Duration

6/25/2019 to 6/28 2:59 AM PDT.

■ Event Summary

You can collect Iroha Potions by playing through the Mitama's Special Training event.
Iroha Potions can be exchanged in the Limited Time Only Shop for items that can be used to power up or Awaken your Magical Girls.

■ How to participate in the Event

Add the Magical Girl you selected for Mitama's Special Training to your Quest Team.
By completing Mitama's Special Training Quests you will receive bonus Episode Points and Experience for her.

■ Magical Girls who can participate in Mitama's Special Training

・Iroha Tamaki
・A Magical Girl of your choice

※You may select only one Magical Girl other than Iroha Tamaki to participate in Mitama's Special Training.
※Note that once you complete a Mitama's Special Training Quest, you cannot change which Magical Girl will participate in Mitama's Special Training.

The following Event Quests will be playable during this event.

□ Mitama's Special Training <Enhance>
・A Quest that awards Bonus EXP to the Magical Girl in training.
・The Magical Girl in training will not receive bonus Episode Points.

□ Mitama's Special Training <Episode>
・A Quest that awards Bonus Episode points to the Magical Girl in training.
・The Magical Girl in training will not receive bonus Experience.

Please note:
・Potions collected during the course of the event that are not used will not be carried over to the next Mitama's Special Training.
・There is a chance that this event will be held again in the future.

Shop (Mitama's Special Training - Iroha Tamaki)

■ Duration

6/25/2019 4:00 AM PDT to 7/2 2:59 AM PDT.

■ Content

You can exchange Iroha Potions for the following items:

Release Celebration Medal

Fate Weave Ticket

Rainbow Orb

AP Potions, Light Orbs, Swallow Tail Feathers, and more are also available.

Important

・Iroha Potions cannot be used once the Shop has closed. Please be sure to use all your Potions while the Shop is still open.
・All unused Iroha Potions will be lost once the event ends. Don't miss your chance to use them!
・The event schedule and contents are subject to change without notice.

We appreciate your support and hope you continue to enjoy Magia Record Puella Magi Madoka Magica [Side Story]!

subject: Regarding Today's Pre-Release Issue
text:
Thank you for downloading Magia Record!

Unfortunately the iOS version of Magia Record was released earlier than expected. iOS players were able to log in from 6/25/2019 8:04 PM to 8:55 PM PDT.

We are very sorry for the confusion.

We would like to apologize for any inconvenience that this may have caused.

As an apology, we will be sending 50 Magia Stones to all players who clear Chapter 1 Episode 2 Battle 2 of the Main Story before 2:59 AM PDT on July 2nd.

We appreciate your support and hope you continue to enjoy Magia Record Puella Magi Madoka Magica [Side Story]!

subject: Issues Under Investigation  (Updated: 7/1 6:15 AM PDT)
text:
Thank you for playing Magia Record!

We are currently investigating the following issues:

Issue: Suggested Friends are not being displayed on the "Find Players" page. Due to this,some players are also experiencing errors when moving from the Battle select screen to the Choose a Support Magical Girl screen at the start of a Quest.
Status: Resolved 6/28 7:48 PM PDT
Compensation: 50 Magia Stones
*Compensation will be sent to players who cleared Chapter 1 Episode 2 Battle 2 of the Main Story before 3:00 AM PDT on July 2nd.

Issue: Players are having trouble searching for friends by player name or player ID on the "Find Players" page.
Status: Resolved 6/27 3:16 AM PDT
Compensation: 50 Magia Stones
*Compensation will be sent to players who cleared Chapter 1 Episode 2 Battle 2 of the Main Story before 3:00 AM PDT on July 2nd.

Issue: Players are unable to play Mirrors after reaching 1,500 Mirrors Points on Mirror Layer 11.
Issue Update: Players are unable to play Mirrors after reaching 1,000 Mirrors Points on Mirror Layer 11.
Status: Resolved 6/28 3:00 PM PDT
Compensation: 2 Days Worth of Daily Missions (10,000 Curse Chips, 2 Master ++ Gems, and 2 Magia Chips), 10 BP Potions, and 50 Magia Stones
* Compensation will be sent to players who had over 1,000 Mirrors Points before 3:00 AM PDT on June 28.


We apologize for any inconvenience that this has caused.

We appreciate your support and hope you continue to enjoy Magia Record Puella Magi Madoka Magica [Side Story]!

subject: Magia Record is Coming to Anime Expo!
text:
Thank you for playing Magia Record!

Panel Summary

From introducing the North American release to future updates, we will show you the magic of Magia Record together with our special guests!

https://www.anime-expo.org

・Room: Live Programming 1 / Petree Hall

subject: Mitama's Special Training - Kyoko Sakura
text:
Thank you for playing Magia Record!

The limited time event, Mitama's Special Training - Kyoko Sakura began on 7/5.

Mitama's Special Training - Kyoko Sakura

■ Event Duration

7/5 to 7/9 2:59 AM PDT

■ Event Summary

You can collect Kyoko Potions by playing through the Mitama's Special Training event.
Kyoko Potions can be exchanged in the Event Shop for items that can be used to power up or Awaken your Magical Girls.

■ How to participate in the Event

Add the Magical Girl you selected for Mitama's Special Training to your Quest Team.
By completing Mitama's Special Training Quests you will receive bonus Episode Points and EXP for her.

■ Magical Girls who can participate in Mitama's Special Training

・Kyoko Sakura
・A Magical Girl of your choice

※You may select only one Magical Girl other than Kyoko Sakura to participate in Mitama's Special Training.
※Note that once you complete a Mitama's Special Training Quest, you cannot change which Magical Girl will participate in Mitama's Special Training.

■ Event Content

The following Event Quests will be playable during this event.

□ Mitama's Special Training <Enhance>
・A Quest that awards Bonus EXP to the Magical Girls in training.
・The Magical Girls in training will not receive bonus Episode Points.

□ Mitama's Special Training <Episode>
・A Quest that awards Bonus Episode points to the Magical Girls in training.
・The Magical Girls in training will not receive Bonus EXP.

Shop (Mitama's Special Training - Kyoko Sakura)

■ Duration

7/5 to 7/12 2:59 AM PDT

■ Content

You can exchange Kyoko Potions for the following items:

Release Celebration Medal

Fate Weave Ticket

Rainbow Orb

AP Potions, Flame Orbs, Sheep Horns, and more are also available.

Note

・Kyoko Potions cannot be used once the Shop has closed. Please be sure to use all your Potions while the Shop is still open.
・All unused Kyoko Potions will be lost once the event ends and will not be carried over to the next Mitama's Special Training. Don't miss your chance to use them!
・There is a chance that this event will be held again in the future.
・The event schedule and contents are subject to change without notice.

We appreciate your support and hope you continue to enjoy Magia Record Puella Magi Madoka Magica [Side Story]!

subject: My Diary with You
text:
Thank you for playing Magia Record!

The limited time only event, My Diary with You began on 7/9.

During this event, you can play quests and enjoy the story of the new Magical Girl, Ren Isuzu. We will also be preparing more difficult Challenge Quests.

In addition, a Fate Weave for the New Magical Girl Ren Isuzu will also be available.
>Info:[Limited Time Only] Ren Isuzu Fate Weave

My Diary with You

■ Event Duration

7/9 to 7/18 2:59 AM PDT

■ Event Summary

During this event, you can play quests and enjoy the story of the new Magical Girl, Ren Isuzu. We will also be preparing more difficult Challenge Quests.

Throughout the event, you can collect items which can be exchanged for limited time only items, such as a Magical Girl Outfit, Memoria, and more.


How to Play

■ 1. Gather Colored Pencils

Play non-event Quests to earn Colored Pencils.
They can be obtained in any of the following quests:
・ Main Story Quests
・ Another Story Quests
・ Magical Girl Story Quests
・ Labyrinth Quests
Equip the following Memoria to increase the number of Colored Pencils dropped:

Here With You

Nothing is Beautiful

Awake, but the Dream Continues


※By equipping any of the above Memoria, you will earn a bonus to each Colored Pencil drop. If none drop, no bonus will be applied.
※Nothing is Beautiful and Awake, but the Dream Continues are available in the Event Shop.

■ 2. Play My Diary with You Event Quests

Use Colored Pencils to play through Event Quests. You can find Notebooks in the special Event Quests.
※Event Quests do not consume any AP.

There are 2 kinds of Event Quests
・Story Quest
Play through these Quests to learn more about Ren!
・Challenge Quest
Play these Quests for an extra challenge!

The more Colored Pencils you use, the more Notebooks you can earn.
※Challenge Quests can only be played after completing the Story.

■ 3. Exchange Notebooks

Exchange the Notebooks for limited time only items, such as a Magical Girl Outfit and Memoria in the Event Shop!
※We stated previously that a Home Background can be traded with Notebooks, but that was incorrect. The Home Background can be claimed at the Mirrors Coins Shop. We are sorry for the confusion caused.

The Event Shop ends at 7/22 3:00 AM PDT so make sure to exchange your Notebooks before then!

Ren's Outfit (Normal Clothes)

Nothing is Beautiful

Awake, but the Dream Continues

Ren Isuzu's
Destiny Gem

Fate Weave Ticket

Magia Chips


※Ren's Outfit (Normal Clothes) can be purchased even if you do not have her. Once you obtain her, you will be able to use this Outfit from the Home Page.
※The Destiny Gem will not be displayed in the Shop if you do not have the Magical Girl Ren Isuzu.

Note

・The event schedule and contents are subject to change without notice.
・Limited time available Outfits and Memoria may appear in future Fate Weaves or Shops.

We appreciate your support and hope you continue to enjoy Magia Record Puella Magi Madoka Magica [Side Story]!

7/16 5:00 AM to 7/23 3:00 AM PDT

subject: And So, The Azaleas Bloom
text:
Thank you for playing Magia Record!

A new event, And So, The Azaleas Bloom began on 7/23.

And So, The Azaleas Bloom

■ Event Duration

7/23 6:00 AM to 8/6 2:59 AM PDT

■ Event Summary


This event introduces three new Magical Girls: Konoha Shizumi, Hazuki Yusa, and Ayame Mikuri. Advance their stories by completing quests. Your choices will determine the ending!

Additionally, you can obtain the Magical Girl Ayame Mikuri by playing the event.

Make the correct choices to find the real ending!

How to Play


Spend AP to play the special Event Quests!
As you play, you'll acquire Red Azaleas and White Azaleas. These can be exchanged for awesome items in the Event Shop!

As you advance through the Event Quests, you will occasionally come across branches in the story. The choices you make during the event will determine how the story progresses!
※Some Event Quests have certain requirements to unlock them. If a quest is locked, please check the requirements on the event map.

As you complete Event Quests, Magical Girl Fragments may drop. These Fragments are necessary for unlocking Quests.

subject: [Coming Soon] Chapter 5 Begins! New Chapter Celebration
text:
Thank you for playing Magia Record!

There will be a New Chapter Celebration to go along with the release of Main Story Chapter 5 on 8/6.

We've prepared a lot of fun bonuses during this campaign to help you advance in the game, so take advantage of this chance to progress in the story! Get double player EXP for clearing Quests, double the chance for Great and Super Success Enhancements, and more!

New Chapter Celebration

■ Duration

8/6 5:00 AM to 8/13 2:59 AM PDT

■ Content

The following Celebration Campaigns will be available starting on 8/6 at 5:00 AM PDT.

□ Quest: Double Player EXP!
Players will be awarded double the amount of EXP from Main Story, Another Story, Magical Girl Story, and Labyrinth Quests.

□ Quest: Double Support Points!
Players will be awarded double the amount of Support Points from Main Story, Another Story, Magical Girl Story, and Labyrinth Quests.
※This increase does not apply to Support Points earned through Login Bonuses.

□ Magical Girl Enhancement: Double Great Success/Super Success Rate!
The chance for a Great or Super Success is double when Enhancing Magical Girls.

□ Support Point Fate Weave: Increased Enhancement Gem Rate!
Enhancement Gems are more likely to appear in the Support Point Fate Weave.

□ Shop
5 Fate Weave Tickets will be available in the Support Point Shop.

□ Special Missions
Main Story Chapter 4 will have additional Battle Clear Missions.
Clear up to Battle 5 in the Main Story Chapter 4 Episode 2 to earn a total of 50 Gems.

Thank you for continuing to support Magia Record Puella Magi Madoka Magica [Side Story]!

subject: [Adjustments] 7/30/2019
text:
Thank you for playing Magia Record!

During today's maintenance, we made several small adjustments.

Below are the various fixes that were made.

1. Mami Tomoe's Magia/Doppel

Updated the skill description to show all effects triggered.

Damages All Enemies [VI] / Skill Surge (Team/1 Turn) / DEF DOWN (Self/1 Turn)
Damages All Enemies [VIII] / Skill Surge (Team/1 Turn) / Burn (Team/3 Turns) / DEF DOWN (Self/1 Turn)
Damages All Enemies [X] / Skill Surge (Team/1 Turn) / Burn (Team/3 Turns)
↓
Damages All Enemies [VI] / Bind (All Foes/1 Turn) / Skill Surge (Team/1 Turn) / DEF DOWN (Self/1 Turn)
Damages All Enemies [VIII] / Bind (All Foes/1 Turn) / Skill Surge (Team/1 Turn) / Burn (All Foes/3 Turns) / DEF DOWN (Self/1 Turn)
Damages All Enemies [X] / Bind (All Foes/1 Turn) / Skill Surge (Team/1 Turn) / Burn (All Foes/3 Turns)

2. Kako Natume's Connect

Adjusted the skill description to make the terms consistent with other skills.

Heal [III] / Remove Debuffs
Heal [V] / Remove Debuffs
Heal [VII] / Remove Debuffs
↓
Heal [III] / Remove Status Ailments
Heal [V] / Remove Status Ailments
Heal [VII] / Remove Status Ailments

3. Rena Minami's Magia

Adjusted the skill description to show the proper skill level.

Damages a Single Enemy [V] / Charges MP (Self) / Accele MP UP (Self/3 Turns)
↓
Damages a Single Enemy [VII] / Charges MP (Self) / Accele MP UP (Self/3 Turns)

4. Other

Fixed various spelling errors and adjusted terms used for consistency.

We sincerely apologize for any confusion caused by these changes.

As an apology, we sent 150 Magia Stones to all players who cleared Chapter 1 Episode 2 Battle 2 of the Main Story before 3:00 AM PDT on 7/30.

We appreciate your support and hope you continue to enjoy Magia Record Puella Magi Madoka Magica [Side Story]!

subject: Chapter 5 Begins! New Chapter Celebration
text:
Thank you for playing Magia Record!

The New Chapter Celebration to go along with the release of Main Story Chapter 5 began on 8/6.

We've prepared a lot of fun bonuses during this campaign to help you advance in the game, so take advantage of this chance to progress in the story! Get double player EXP for clearing Quests, double the chance for Great and Super Success Enhancements, and more!

New Chapter Celebration

■ Duration

8/6 6:00 AM to 8/13 2:59 AM PDT

■ Content

The following Celebration Campaigns will be available starting on 8/6 at 6:00 AM PDT.

□ Quest: Double Player EXP!
Players will be awarded double the amount of EXP from Main Story, Another Story, Magical Girl Story, and Labyrinth Quests.

□ Quest: Double Support Points!
Players will be awarded double the amount of Support Points from Main Story, Another Story, Magical Girl Story, and Labyrinth Quests.
※This increase does not apply to Support Points earned through Login Bonuses.

□ Magical Girl Enhancement: Double Great Success/Super Success Rate!
The chance for a Great or Super Success is double when Enhancing Magical Girls.

□ Support Point Fate Weave: Increased Enhancement Gem Rate!
Enhancement Gems are more likely to appear in the Support Point Fate Weave.

□ Shop
5 Fate Weave Tickets will be available in the Support Point Shop.

□ Special Missions
Main Story Chapter 5 will have additional Battle Clear Missions.
Clear up to Battle 5 in the Main Story Chapter 5 Episode 2 to earn a total of 50 Gems.

Thank you for continuing to support Magia Record Puella Magi Madoka Magica [Side Story]!

subject: Reaching a Happier Height
text:
Thank you for playing Magia Record!

The limited time only event, Reaching a Happier Height, began on 8/6.

In addition, the Kokoro & Masara Fate Weave will also be available.
>Info:Kokoro & Masara Fate Weave

Reaching a Happier Height

■ Event Duration

8/6 to 8/13 2:59 AM PDT

■ Event Summary

During this event, you can play quests and enjoy the story of Magical Girls Kokoro Awane and Masara Kagami. We will also be preparing more difficult Challenge Quests.

How to Play

■1. Gather Mitama's Special Energy Drinks

Play non-event Quests to earn Mitama's Special Energy Drinks.
They can be obtained in any of the following quests:
　・Main Story Quests
　・Another Story Quests
　・Magical Girl Story Quests
　・Labyrinth Quests

Equip the following Memoria to increase the number of Mitama's Special Energy Drinks dropped:

Perfectly Imbalanced

An Unexpected Reaction

An Average Day

※By equipping any of the above Memoria, you will earn a bonus to each Mitama's Special Energy Drinks drop. If none drop, no bonus will be applied.
※Perfectly Imbalanced and An Unexpected Reaction are available in the Event Shop.

■2. Play Reaching a Happier Height Event Quests

Use Mitama's Special Energy Drinks to play Event Quests. You can find Premium Rice in these special Event Quests.
※Event Quests do not consume any AP.

There are 2 kinds of Event Quests
・Story Quest
Play through these Quests to learn more about the Magical Girls!

・Challenge Quest
Play these Quests for an extra challenge!

The more Mitama's Special Energy Drinks you use for a Quest, the more Premium Rice you can earn.
※Challenge Quests can only be played after completing the Story.

■3. Earn Limited Time Only Outfits

Limited time only outfits for Awane Kokoro and Masara Kagami can be earned by clearing the following quests.
・Normal Quest: Outdoor Clothes for Kokoro Awane
・Challenge Quest 5: Outdoor Clothes for Masara Kagami


■4. Exchange Premium Rice

Exchange the Premium Rice for limited time only items, such as a new Home Background and Memoria in the Event Shop!

The Event Shop ends on 8/16 at 3:00 AM PDT, so make sure to exchange your Mitama's Special Energy Drinks before then!

Perfectly Imbalanced

An Unexpected Reaction

Destiny Bottle

Fate Weave Ticket

Magia Chip


■5. Destiny Bottle

20 Premium Rice can be exchanged for 1 Destiny Bottle which can be exchanged for a Destiny Gem.

25 Destiny Bottles: Kokoro Awane's Destiny Gem (Only once)
5 Destiny Bottles: Destiny Gem of any ★3 Magical Girl (Up to 3 times)
1 Destiny Bottle : Destiny Gem of any ★2 Magical Girl (Up to 10 times)

※Destiny Gems will not be displayed in the Shop if you do not have the Magical Girl

Note

・The event schedule and contents are subject to change without notice.
・Limited time only Outfits and Memoria may appear in future Fate Weaves or Shops.

We appreciate your support and hope you continue to enjoy Magia Record Puella Magi Madoka Magica [Side Story]!

subject: Another Daze - Puella Magi Kazumi☆Magica -
text:
Thank you for playing Magia Record!

A new event, Another Daze - Puella Magi Kazumi☆Magica - began on 8/13.

In addition, the Another Daze Fate Weave is also available.
>Info: Another Daze Fate Weave

Another Daze - Puella Magi Kazumi☆Magica -

■ Event Duration

8/13 6:00 AM to 8/22 2:59 AM PDT

■ Content

This event introduces three new Magical Girls: Kazumi, Umika Misaki, and Kaoru Maki from Puella Magi Kazumi☆Magica, a Madoka Magica spin-off. This trio of Magical Girls got lost in Kamihama City after chasing a Witch from Asunaro City.

Try to complete Area Missions! Area Missions can be completed by playing the area’s Event Quests. These Event Quests have turn limits. Do as much as you can before the battle ends!

Clear enough Area Missions and you will unlock a Boss Area!

How to Play

Choose an area on the map, and then select an Event Quest. These quests have three difficulties: Easy, Medium, and Hard. Choose the difficulty that’s right for you!
You can find Kazumi Medals in Event Quests. Exchange these medals for limited time only items, such as a new Home Background, Memoria, and more.

Equip the following Memoria to increase the number of Kazumi Medals dropped:
The Flavor of Drama!
All Three of Us, Going Forward

※The Flavor of Drama! is available in the Event Shop.

■ Limited Turn Battles

Event Quests have turn limits.
Clear the quest by reaching the turn limit, or defeating all the enemies. All difficulties of Event Quests have the same turn limit and AP cost. Higher difficulty quests have more enemies! Complete these quests to achieve the Area Mission faster.

■ Area Progression

Clear any quest in an area to advance to the next area. You can also advance to the next area by clearing the Area Mission. A new chapter of the story will be released every day for the first eight days of the event.

■ Area Missions

Each area has its own Area Mission with one of two conditions: defeat a certain number of enemies, or do a certain amount of damage. Clear the Area Mission to get an Area Flag!

Area Flags can be exchanged in the Event Shop for the Magical Girl Umika Misaki, her Destiny Gems, Awakening Materials and Enhance Magia Materials.

※Even if you reach the turn limit or fail the quest, the number of enemies taken down or the amount of damage dealt will be added to the total needed to clear the Area Mission.

■ Boss Area

Once you clear every Area Missions in a chapter, that chapter’s Boss Area will appear. Bosses have high HP, so they sometimes cannot be defeated in one attempt. If you are defeated by a boss, the amount of damage dealt during that attempt will be subtracted from the boss’s Area Mission HP Gauge.

※Known Bugs
The turn limit displayed during boss battles is currently not working as intended. We are sorry for any confusion this may cause. Fortunately, this has no effect on the progression of the event itself. Boss battle turn limits can be confirmed on the pre-battle screen.

■ Defeating the Boss

Defeat a Boss for a special item!

■ Event Rewards

Completely clear this event to get 250 Magia Stones!. You can also get enough Materials to fully awaken Umika Misaki and fully enhance her Magia!.

Event Shop

Exchange the Kazumi Medals for limited time only items, such as a new Home Background, Memoria, and more. Area Flags collected from Area Missions can be exchanged in the Event Shop for the Magical Girl Umika Misaki, her Destiny Gems, Awakening Materials, and Enhance Magia Materials. Check out the Event Shop for more details!

subject: [Update] Regarding Today's Emergency Maintenance
text:
Thank you for playing Magia Record!

Updated 8/27 9:00 AM PDT

Due to some players receiving double compensation, we performed a second emergency maintenance to fix this issue.

It has come to our attention that Monday's Labyrinth of Awakening Master Battle was spawning an unusual amount of enemies that drop a special item.

We are sorry for any confusion this has caused.

During 8/27's emergency maintenance we have performed the following actions:

・Retrieval of all Rainbow Orbs that were gained from this quest.
・Distribution of compensation.

Compensation Details

Your compensation depends on how many improperly gained Rainbow Orbs were able to be successfully retrieved from your account.

・30 AP for every improperly gained Rainbow Orb successfully retrieved from your account.
※This AP was distributed through 50 AP Potions. (Compensated AP was rounded up to the nearest fifty.)

Additional compensation was also sent based on how many improperly gained Rainbow Orbs were unsuccessfully retrieved from your account.

・0-5:
1) 5 Rainbow Orbs minus the number of improperly gained Rainbow Orbs that were unsuccessfully retrieved from your account.
2) 200 Magia Stones
・6-30: 100 Magia Stones
・31 and over: Nothing

※Players who did not obtain any Rainbow Orbs from the applicable quest will receive 5 Rainbow Orbs.

As a further apology, we have sent 100 Magia Stones to all players who cleared Chapter 1 Episode 2 Battle 2 of the Main Story before 3:30 AM PDT on 8/27.

Please withdraw all compensation from your Present Box.

Once again, we are very sorry for any confusion this has caused.

We appreciate your support and hope you continue to enjoy Magia Record Puella Magi Madoka Magica [Side Story]!

subject: [Updated] Mirrors Ranking
text:
Thank you for playing Magia Record!

Updated 9/2 12:00 AM PDT

It has come to our attention that some of the times listed in this announcement were incorrect.
The Final Round ends on 9/4 at 10:59 PM PDT.
The Final Round's Results will be finished being tallied on 9/5 at 12:00 AM PDT.
We are sorry for any confusion this has caused.

Updated 8/29 10:30 PM PDT

It has come to our attention that one of the pop-up messages during the Mirrors Ranking event were displaying inaccurate information.
"The counter will be reset at 4:00 PM PDT" should have been "The counter will be reset at 2:00 AM PDT".
We are sorry for any confusion this has caused.

Mirrors Ranking began on 8/29

Mirrors Ranking

■ Duration

8/29 5:00 AM to 9/4 11:59 PM PDT

■ Contents

Battle other players in Mirrors and shoot for a higher rank!
Earn Ranking Medals and Mirrors Coins from these special battles!
At the end of the event, you will be awarded with an emblem depending on your rank.
Battles in the Mirrors Ranking do not consume AP and you can obtain Ranking Medals and Mirrors Coins.

Mirrors Ranking Battles do not cost any AP! In addition, AP costs for all Quests will be halved during this event. Don't miss this chance to power up your Magical Girls!



■ Preliminary Round

■ Duration
8/29 5:00 AM to 9/3 2:00 AM PDT

■ Contents
During the Preliminary Round, players can battle up to 10 times a day. The results of this round will decide your Class for the Final Round.

※Opponents can be changed up to 10 times every day.
※The daily limits will be reset each day of the Preliminary Round at 2:00 AM PDT.
※Defending has no effect on your Ranking Points.

■ Preliminary Round Results
Day 2-4: Your current Class will be updated every day at 2:00 AM PDT.
Day 5: Your final Class will be determined at 3:00 AM PDT.
※While the Preliminary Round results are being calculated, players cannot play Endless Mirrors or Mirrors Ranking.
※Battles that end after 9/3 2:00 AM will not be counted in the above calculations.

■ Final Round

■ Duration
9/3 3:00 AM to 9/4 10:59 PM PDT

■ Contents
During the Final Round, players will battle against other players of the same Class for Ranking Points. These Ranking Points will determine your Tier at the end of this round. Players can battle up to 20 times and change their opponents 20 times during this period.

※Ranking Points earned during the Preliminary Round will be carried over to the Final Round.
※Defending has no effect on your Ranking Points.
※If you join the Final Round without participating in the Preliminary Round you will automatically be placed in D Class.

■ Final Round Results
Your Tier will be determined at 12:00 AM.

If you end up in Class B or higher, you will be awarded with an emblem! This emblem will be displayed on your profile and Friend & Support screen!




■ Ranking Point Bonus

・Performance Bonus Earn more bonus points by winning in fewer turns and using more Connect Skills!
※Only the first three uses of a Connect Skill will affect this bonus.
・Power Bonus The stronger the opponent you defeat, the more Ranking Points you receive.

・Break Chance Ranking points will increase greatly at specific battle times.


■　Event Rewards

During this event, Ranking Medals can be obtained. In addition, the number of Mirrors Coins earned will also be increased. Ranking Medals can be exchanged in the shop for Fate Weave Tickets, Memoria Circuit Cores, and more!

Note

・The event schedule and contents are subject to change without notice.
・If you close the app or lose connection while battling, the battle will count as a loss and a battle count will also be consumed. Please be sure to not close the app and use a stable connection when battling during Mirrors Ranking.
・In confirmed cases of cheating, there is a chance that the applicable player’s Ranking Points will be reset.
・Ranking medals will not transfer to the next round of Mirrors Ranking.

We appreciate your support and hope you continue to enjoy Magia Record Puella Magi Madoka Magica [Side Story]!

subject: [Coming Soon] Yachiyo's Doppel Challenge
text:
Thank you for playing Magia Record!

Yachiyo Nanami's ★5 Awakening, and Doppel will be released on 9/5

Together with this release, special missions for the Yachiyo's Doppel Challenge will be available.

Yachiyo's Doppel Challenge

■ Available Starting

9/5 5:00 AM PDT
*Note that there is no time limit to complete Doppel Challenge Missions.

■ Contents

30 special missions that detail the steps to unleash Yachiyo's Doppel will be available. By completing them, you can obtain Materials used to Awaken Yachiyo Nanami, Enhance her Magia, and unleash her Doppel.

In addition, you can obtain Yachiyo Nanami though Mitama's Special Training - Yachiyo Nanami. Don’t miss out on this chance to power up one of the stars of Magia Record Yachiyo Nanami!

Note

・The event schedule and contents are subject to change without notice.

We appreciate your support and hope you continue to enjoy Magia Record Puella Magi Madoka Magica [Side Story]!

subject: Announcement Issue Compensation
text:
Thank you for playing Magia Record!

It has come to our attention that the announcement for Iroha's Birthday Party's Login Bonus was not accurate.

We are sorry for any confusion this has caused.

As an apology, we have sent 2 Iroha's Birthday Medals, 1 10x Tsukuyo Amane Fate Weave Ticket, and 10 Magia Stones to all players who cleared Chapter 1 Episode 2 Battle 2 of the Main Story before today's maintenance.

text:
Thank you for playing Magia Record!

There will be a New Chapter Celebration to go along with the release of Main Story Chapter 6 on 9/9.

We've prepared a lot of fun bonuses during this campaign to help you advance in the game, so take advantage of this chance to progress in the story! Get double player EXP for clearing Quests, double the chance for Great and Super Success Enhancements, and more!

New Chapter Celebration

■ Duration

9/9 4:00 AM to 9/17 2:59 AM PDT

■ Content

The following Celebration Campaigns will be available starting on 9/9 at 4:00 AM PDT.

□ Quest: Double Player EXP!
Players will be awarded double the amount of EXP from Main Story, Another Story, Magical Girl Story, and Labyrinth Quests.

□ Quest: Double Support Points!
Players will be awarded double the amount of Support Points from Main Story, Another Story, Magical Girl Story, and Labyrinth Quests.
※This increase does not apply to Support Points earned through Login Bonuses.

□ Magical Girl Enhancement: Double Great Success/Super Success Rate!
The chance for a Great or Super Success is double when Enhancing Magical Girls.

□ Shop
5 Fate Weave Tickets will be available in the Support Point Shop.

□ Special Missions
Main Story Chapter 6 will have additional Battle Clear Missions.
Clear up to Battle 5 in the Main Story Chapter 6 Episode 4 to earn a total of 72 Gems.

Thank you for continuing to support Magia Record Puella Magi Madoka Magica [Side Story]!

subject: The Maiden of Hope - Puella Magi Darc☆Magica -
text:
Thank you for playing Magia Record!

A new event, The Maiden of Hope - Puella Magi Darc☆Magica - began on 9/11.


In addition, The Maiden of Hope Fate Weave Round 1 will also be available.

>Info: The Maiden of Hope Fate Weave Round 1

The Maiden of Hope - Puella Magi Darc☆Magica -

■ Event Duration

9/11 5:00 AM to 9/25 2:59 AM PDT

■ Content

This event introduces three new Magical Girls: Darc, Melissa, and Liz from Puella Magi Darc☆Magica, a Madoka Magica spin-off. This story takes place in France during the Hundred Years' War.

Try to complete Area Missions! Area Missions can be completed by playing the area’s Event Quests. These Event Quests have turn limits. Do as much as you can before the battle ends!

Additionally, you can obtain the Magical Girl Melissa (Voiced by: Ai Kakuma) by playing the event.

How to Play

Choose an area on the map, and then select an Event Quest. These quests have three difficulties: Easy, Medium, and Hard. Choose the difficulty that’s right for you!

You can find Maiden Medals in Event Quests. Exchange these medals for limited time only items, such as a new Home Background, Memoria, and more.

※The new Home Background will be added to the Event Shop at the beginning of Part 2.

Equip the following Memoria to increase the number of Maiden Medals dropped:
Monsieur Angel's Banner
Reinforcements from Another Time
The Third Magical Girl

※Monsieur Angel's Banner is available in the Event Shop.
※The Third Magical Girl is a limited time only Memoria available in The Maiden of Hope Fate Weave Round 2.

■ Limited Turn Battles

Event Quests have turn limits.
Clear the quest by reaching the turn limit, or defeating all the enemies. All difficulties of Event Quests have the same turn limit and AP cost. Higher difficulty quests have more enemies! Complete these quests to achieve the Area Mission faster.

■ Area Progression

Clear any quest in an area to advance to the next area. You can also advance to the next area by clearing the Area Mission. The first six chapters of the story will be released at the beginning of the event.

※The rest of the story will be released on 9/19 at 5:00 AM PDT.

■ Area Missions

Each area has its own Area Mission with one of two conditions: defeat a certain number of enemies, or do a certain amount of damage. Clear the Area Mission to get an Area Flag!

Area Flags can be exchanged in the Event Shop for the Magical Girl Melissa, her Destiny Gems, Awakening Materials, and Enhance Magia Materials.

※Even if you reach the turn limit or fail the quest, the number of enemies taken down or the amount of damage dealt will be added to the total needed to clear the Area Mission.

■ Boss Area

Once you clear every Area Mission in a chapter, that chapter’s Boss Area will appear. Bosses have high HP, so they sometimes cannot be defeated in one attempt. If you are defeated by a boss, the amount of damage dealt during that attempt will be subtracted from the boss’s Area Mission HP Gauge.

※Known Bugs
The turn limit displayed during boss battles will not work as intended when playing version 1.0.8 or below. Please be sure to download the newest version of Magia Record from the Google Play Store/App Store before playing.

■ Defeating the Boss

Defeat a Boss for a special item!

■ Event Rewards

Completely clear this event to get 250 Magia Stones! You can also get enough Materials to fully awaken Melissa and fully enhance her Magia!

Event Shop

Exchange the Maiden Medals for limited time only items, such as a new Home Background, Memoria, and more.

※The new Home Background will be added to the Event Shop at the beginning of Part 2.
Area Flags collected from Area Missions can be exchanged in the Event Shop for the Magical Girl Melissa, her Destiny Gems, Awakening Materials, and Enhance Magia Materials. Check out the Event Shop for more details!

■ New Magical Girl

Melissa
MAX HP
13221

3938

subject: The Maiden of Hope - Puella Magi Darc☆Magica - Part 2
text:
Thank you for playing Magia Record!

Part 2 of The Maiden of Hope - Puella Magi Darc☆Magica - began on 9/19.


In addition, The Maiden of Hope Fate Weave Round 2 will also be available.

>Info: The Maiden of Hope Fate Weave Round 2

The Maiden of Hope - Puella Magi Darc☆Magica -

■ Event Duration

9/11 5:00 AM to 9/25 2:59 AM PDT

■ Content

This event introduces three new Magical Girls: Darc, Melissa, and Liz from Puella Magi Darc☆Magica, a Madoka Magica spin-off. This story takes place in France during the Hundred Years' War.

Try to complete Area Missions! Area Missions can be completed by playing the area’s Event Quests. These Event Quests have turn limits. Do as much as you can before the battle ends!

Additionally, you can obtain the Magical Girl Melissa (Voiced by: Ai Kakuma) by playing the event.

How to Play

Choose an area on the map, and then select an Event Quest. These quests have three difficulties: Easy, Medium, and Hard. Choose the difficulty that’s right for you!

You can find Maiden Medals in Event Quests. Exchange these medals for limited time only items, such as a new Home Background, Memoria, and more.

Equip the following Memoria to increase the number of Maiden Medals dropped:
Monsieur Angel's Banner
Reinforcements from Another Time
The Third Magical Girl

※Monsieur Angel's Banner is available in the Event Shop.
※The Third Magical Girl is a limited time only Memoria available in The Maiden of Hope Fate Weave Round 2.

■ Limited Turn Battles

Event Quests have turn limits.
Clear the quest by reaching the turn limit, or defeating all the enemies. All difficulties of Event Quests have the same turn limit and AP cost. Higher difficulty quests have more enemies! Complete these quests to achieve the Area Mission faster.

■ Area Progression

Clear any quest in an area to advance to the next area. You can also advance to the next area by clearing the Area Mission. The first six chapters of the story will be released at the beginning of the event.

■ Area Missions

Each area has its own Area Mission with one of two conditions: defeat a certain number of enemies, or do a certain amount of damage. Clear the Area Mission to get an Area Flag!

Area Flags can be exchanged in the Event Shop for the Magical Girl Melissa, her Destiny Gems, Awakening Materials, and Enhance Magia Materials.

※Even if you reach the turn limit or fail the quest, the number of enemies taken down or the amount of damage dealt will be added to the total needed to clear the Area Mission.

■ Boss Area

Once you clear every Area Mission in a chapter, that chapter’s Boss Area will appear. Bosses have high HP, so they sometimes cannot be defeated in one attempt. If you are defeated by a boss, the amount of damage dealt during that attempt will be subtracted from the boss’s Area Mission HP Gauge.

※Known Bugs
The turn limit displayed during boss battles will not work as intended when playing version 1.0.8 or below. Please be sure to download the newest version of Magia Record from the Google Play Store/App Store before playing.

■ Defeating the Boss

Defeat a Boss for a special item!

■ Event Rewards

Completely clear this event to get 250 Magia Stones! You can also get enough Materials to fully awaken Melissa and fully enhance her Magia!

Event Shop

Exchange the Maiden Medals for limited time only items, such as a new Home Background, Memoria, and more.


Area Flags collected from Area Missions can be exchanged in the Event Shop for the Magical Girl Melissa, her Destiny Gems, Awakening Materials, and Enhance Magia Materials. Check out the Event Shop for more details!

See You Tomorrow

■ Event Duration

9/30 5:00 AM to 10/10 11:59 PM PDT

■ Event Summary

This event introduces three new Magical Girls: Leila Ibuki (Voiced by: Marika Kouno), Seika Kumi (Voiced by: Azumi Waki), and Mito Aino (Voiced by: Maria Naganawa). Advance through their stories by completing quests. Your choices will determine the ending!

Additionally, you can obtain the Magical Girl Seika Kumi through the Event Shop.

Make the correct choices to find the real ending!

How to Play



Spend AP to play the special Event Quests!
As you play, you'll acquire Green Secret Acorns and Brown Secret Acorns. These can be exchanged for awesome items in the Event Shop!

※Hello from the Stairwell is available in the Event Shop.

■ Area Progression



As you advance through the Event Quests, you will occasionally come across branches in the story. The choices you make during the event will determine how the story progresses!

This event is divided into two parts.
Part 2 is scheduled to begin following the maintenance on 10/4.

※Some Event Quests have certain requirements to unlock them. If a quest is locked, please check the requirements on the event map.
※In order to play Part 2, you must first clear Part 1.
※Part 1 Quests will be available even after Part 2 begins.

■ Magia Stones

You can obtain a total of 250 Magia Stones by clearing all Quests during this event. Complete all the Quests for these Magia Stones!

■ Story & Archive

This story will be available in the Archive after the event ends.

Event Shop

■ Duration

9/30 5:00 AM to 10/15 2:59 AM PDT

Trade the Green/Brown Secret Acorns you earn in quests in the Event Shop for the limited time Magical Girl Seika Kumi and limited time only items such as a new Home Background, Memoria, and more!


Note

・The event schedule and contents are subject to change without notice.

subject: [Coming Soon] New Chapter Celebration & Ria Ami Login Bonus
text:
Thank you for playing Magia Record!

There will be a New Chapter Celebration to go along with the release of Main Story Chapter 7 on 10/11.

We've prepared a lot of fun bonuses during this campaign to help you advance in the game, so take advantage of this chance to progress in the story! Get double player EXP for clearing Quests, double the chance for Great and Super Success Enhancements, and more!

New Chapter Celebration

■ Duration

10/11 2:00 AM to 10/18 11:59 PM PDT

■ Content

The following Celebration Campaigns will be available starting on 10/11 at 2:00 AM PDT.

□ Special Login Bonus
To celebrate the release of the new Magical Girl Ria Ami, we will be offering a special Login Bonus!
In addition to the regular Login Bonus, log in during the event to receive the following Presents. (Up to five separate days.)
×1

Fate Weave Ticket

×10

Magia Stones


□ 1/2 AP Cost
AP costs for Main Story Chapter 1-6 will be halved during this period!

□ Quest: Double Player EXP!
Players will be awarded double the amount of EXP from Main Story, Another Story, Magical Girl Story, and Labyrinth Quests.

□ Quest: Double Support Points!
Players will be awarded double the amount of Support Points from Main Story, Another Story, Magical Girl Story, and Labyrinth Quests.
※This increase does not apply to Support Points earned through Login Bonuses.

□ Magical Girl Enhancement: Double Great Success/Super Success Rate!
The chance for a Great or Super Success is double when Enhancing Magical Girls.

□ Special Missions
Main Story Chapter 7 will have additional Battle Clear Missions.
Clear up to Battle 1 in the Main Story Chapter 7 Episode 2 to earn a total of 15 Gems.

Thank you for continuing to support Magia Record Puella Magi Madoka Magica [Side Story]!

subject: [Coming Soon] Mitama's Special Training - Iroha Tamaki
text:
Thank you for playing Magia Record!

Mitama's Special Training - Iroha Tamaki is scheduled to begin on 10/11.

You can collect Iroha Potions by playing through the Mitama's Special Training event.

Iroha Potions can be exchanged in the Event Shop for items that can be used to power up or Awaken your Magical Girls.

Play Mitama's Special Training with Iroha Tamaki on your team to receive bonus EXP and Episode Points.


In addition, Iroha will be able to be Awakened to ★4!

Don’t miss out on this chance to power up one of the stars of Magia Record, Iroha Tamaki!

Mitama's Special Training - Iroha Tamaki

■ Duration

10/11 2:00 AM to 10/14 11:59 PM PDT

■ Content

□ Mitama's Special Training <Story>
・A Story Quest for Iroha Tamaki.

□ Mitama's Special Training <Enhance>
・A Quest that awards Bonus EXP to the Magical Girls in training.
・The Magical Girls in training will not receive Bonus Episode Points.

□ Mitama's Special Training <Episode>
・A Quest that awards Bonus Episode Points to the Magical Girls in training.
・The Magical Girls in training will not receive Bonus EXP.

□ Mitama's Special Training <Extra>
・Play these Quests for an extra challenge!

10/11 2:00 AM to 10/17 11:59 PM PDT

Fate Weave Ticket

Rainbow Orb

Note

・ Potions cannot be used once the Event Shop has closed. Please be sure to use all your Potions while the Event Shop is still open.
・ All unused Potions will be lost once the event ends.
・ The event schedule and contents are subject to change without notice.

Players will be awarded double the amount of Support Points from Main Story, Another Story, Magical Girl Story, and Labyrinth Quests.
※This increase does not apply to Support Points earned through Login Bonuses.

□ Magical Girl Enhancement: Double Great Success/Super Success Rate!
The chance for a Great or Super Success is double when Enhancing Magical Girls.

□ Special Missions
Main Story Chapter 7 will have additional Battle Clear Missions.
Clear up to Battle 1 in the Main Story Chapter 7 Episode 2 to earn a total of 15 Gems.

Thank you for continuing to support Magia Record Puella Magi Madoka Magica [Side Story]!

subject: CROSS CONNECTION
text:
Updated 10/18 1:00 AM PDT

Part 2 of CROSS CONNECTION started on 10/18.
New stories were unlocked and new items were added to the event shop!

Thank you for playing Magia Record!

A new event, CROSS CONNECTION began on 10/15 .


In addition, the CROSS CONNECTION Fate Weave is also available.
>Info: CROSS CONNECTION Fate Weave

CROSS CONNECTION

■ Event Duration

10/15 2:00 AM to 10/24 11:59 PM PDT

■ Content

This event introduces three new Magical Girls: Suzune Amano, Arisa Narumi, and Chisato Shion from Puella Magi Suzune☆Magica, a Madoka Magica spin-off.

Try to complete Area Missions! Area Missions can be completed by playing the area's Event Quests. These Event Quests have turn limits. Do as much as you can before the battle ends!

Additionally, you can obtain the Magical Girl Arisa Narumi (Voiced by: Kana Ueda) by playing the event.

How to Play

Choose an area on the map, and then select an Event Quest. These quests have three difficulties: Easy, Medium, and Hard. Choose the difficulty that's right for you!

You can find Suzune Medals in Event Quests. Exchange these medals for limited time only items, such as a new Home Background, Memoria, and more.

Equip the following Memoria to increase the number of Suzune Medals dropped:
A Sword Between Light and Dark
When All's Said and Done

※When All's Said and Done is available in the Event Shop.

■ Limited Turn Battles

Event Quests have turn limits.
Clear the quest by reaching the turn limit, or defeating all the enemies. All difficulties of Event Quests have the same turn limit and AP cost. Higher difficulty quests have more enemies! Complete these quests to clear the Area Mission faster.

■ Area Progression

Clear any quest in an area to advance to the next area. You can also advance to the next area by clearing the Area Mission. The first five chapters of the story will be released at the beginning of the event.

※The rest of the story will be released on 10/18 at 1:00 AM PDT.

■ Area Missions

Each area has its own Area Mission. Clear the Area Mission to get an Area Flag!

Area Flags can be exchanged in the Event Shop for the Magical Girl Arisa Narumi, her Destiny Gems, Awakening Materials, and Enhance Magia Materials.

※Even if you reach the turn limit or fail the quest, the number of enemies taken down or the amount of damage dealt will be added to the total needed to clear the Area Mission.

■ Boss Area

Once you clear every Area Mission in a chapter, that chapter’s Boss Area will appear. Bosses have high HP, so they sometimes cannot be defeated in one attempt. If you are defeated by a boss, the amount of damage dealt during that attempt will be subtracted from the boss’s Area Mission HP Gauge.

■ Defeating the Boss

Defeat a Boss for a special item!

■ Event Rewards

Completely clear this event to get 250 Magia Stones!
You can also get enough Materials to fully awaken Arisa Narumi and fully enhance her Magia!

Event Shop

Exchange Suzune Medals for limited time only items, such as a new Home Background, Memoria, and more.

text:
Thank you for playing Magia Record!

A new event, Magical Halloween Theater, began on 10/25.



Magical Halloween Theater

■ Event Duration

10/25 6:00 AM to 10/31 11:59 PM PDT

■ Event Summary

This event introduces a new Magical Girl Karin Misono (Voiced by: Hisako Kanemoto). Help Karin and her friends make their play, The Magical Halloween Theater, a success!
You can even use a special Event Item “Magical Candy” to power up your team during the Event Quests.



■ How to Play

Spend BP to play the special Event Quests!
Play these quests for Party Points.
Once you reach a certain number of Party Points, the quest is cleared and you will get rewards.

New limited time Quests will be released every day until 10/30.

※Party Points cannot be acquired from quests you've already cleared.
※Memoria can not be equipped to the Magical Girls during this event.

■ Magical Candy

This event introduces a new event only item Magical Candy.

HP Magical Candy
ATK Magical Candy
DEF Magical Candy

There are 3 types of Magical Candies that power up either HP, ATK, or DEF.

Up to three pieces of Magical Candy can be used during the same battle.

Using more than one of a certain type of Magical Candy will give you a bigger bonus.

1 piece of candy of the same type: 20% up
2 pieces of candy of the same type: 50% up
3 pieces of candy of the same type: 100% up

Support Points can be exchanged for Magical Candy in the Magical Candy Shop.
In addition, Magical Candy Box can be purchased in the Magia Stone Shop.

※Magical Candy can not be used once the event has finished.

■ Quest Missions

Each Event Quest has 3 missions.

Clear a mission for a Ghost Medal!

Ghost Medals can be exchanged for awesome items in the Event Shop!

※You will only receive a Ghost Medal after clearing a mission the first time.

■ Event Clear Rewards

You can obtain a total of 250 Magia Stones, the limited time only Memoria Magical Halloween Theater, and a new Home Background by clearing all Quests during this event.

subject: [Adjustments and Updates] 10/25/2019
text:
Thank you for playing Magia Record!

During maintenance on 10/25, various adjustments and additions were made.

Updates

■ Magia Report

・You can now read Magia Report from the Archive!

■ Destiny Crystal

You can get Magia Chips AND a Destiny Crystal if you trade a Destiny Gem of a natural ★4 Magical Girl that's had her magic fully unlocked!

Exchange 5 Destiny Crystals for a ★4 Magical Girl of your choice!

※Not all Magical Girls are available in the “Destiny Crystals” Shop.
※Limited Time Only Magical Girls can only be exchanged in the Shop while their corresponding Fate Weave is available.

■ Auto Team

・The “Auto Team” option is now available when you create a team. The [Auto Team] button will appear in the upper left-hand corner when you are creating a team.

■ Memoria

・The Memoria Vault has been added. 400 more Memoria can now be stored in this vault.
・Only Ascendable Memoria will be displayed in the Ascend Memoria Page.
・New filters for "Enhancement Status" have also been added.
・A [Select All ★1/2s] button can also be used when selecting Materials to Enhance a Memoria.

※★1/2 Memoria are used in the order in which they were obtained.

■ Friend Battles

Players who Follow each other can now engage in Mirrors battles in the new [Friend Battles].

■ Missions

・Daily Mission adjustments
1) Battling 1 time in Mirrors will now award you with 1 Daily Coin.
2) Battling 5 times in Mirrors will now award you with 7 Mirrors Coins.

■ Shop

・The “Daily Coins” Shop has been added.

※Earn Daily Coins from Daily Missions.

・The amount of each item you currently have will be displayed in the Shop.
・The stats of Magical Girls and Memoria can be displayed by holding down on their icons.

※Magical Girls are shown at their Max Level in their non-Awakened state.
※Memoria are shown at their Max Level in their fourth-Ascended state.

■ Other

・The Play Again option is now available at the end of a battle.
・The [Play Again] button will appear at the bottom right corner of the Quest Results page.

※This cannot be used before clearing a quest.
※This function cannot be used during some Event Quests.

・Adjusted the Present Box History Page.
・Other minor updates and bug fixes were performed.

We appreciate your support and hope you continue to enjoy Magia Record Puella Magi Madoka Magica [Side Story]!

text:
Thank you for playing Magia Record!

You can collect Mitama Potions by playing through the Mitama's Special Training event.

Mitama Potions can be exchanged in the Event Shop for items that can be used to power up or Awaken your Magical Girls.

Play Mitama's Special Training with Mitama Yakumo on your team to receive bonus EXP and Episode Points.

Don't miss out on this chance to power up one of the stars of Magia Record, Mitama Yakumo!

■ Duration

11/1 2:00 AM to 11/4 11:59 PM PDT

subject: FM Kamihama
text:
Thank you for playing Magia Record!

A new event, FM Kamihama, began on 11/5.



In addition, the Himika Mao Fate Weave will also be available.
　>info: Himika Mao Fate Weave

FM Kamihama

■ Event Duration

11/5 to 11/12 11:59 PM PST

■ Event Summary

During this event, you can play quests and enjoy the story of Magical Girl Madoka-senpai. We have also prepared more difficult Challenge Quests.



Additionally, you can obtain the Magical Girl Madoka-senpai (Voiced by: Aoi Yuki) by playing the event.


How to Play

■ Gather Listener Letters

Play Non-Event Quests to earn Listener Letters.
They can be obtained in any of the following quests:
　・Main Story Quests
　・Another Story Quests
　・Magical Girl Story Quests
　・Labyrinth Quests

Equip the following Memoria to increase the number of Listener Letters dropped:

Starlight Power!

The Third Amane Sister


■ Play FM Kamihama Event Quests

Use Listener Letters to play Event Quests. You can find Kitchen Supplies in these special Event Quests.
※Event Quests do not consume any AP.

There are 2 kinds of Event Quests
・Story Quests
Play through these quests to learn more about the Magical Girls!

・Challenge Quests
Play these quests for an extra challenge!

The more Listener Letters you use for a quest, the more Kitchen Supplies you can earn.

The quest release schedule can be found by tapping [Quest Release] on the upper right corner of the Event page.

Kitchen Supplies

Exchange Kitchen Supplies for Madoka-senpai or limited time only items such as a new Home Background and more.



■ Magical Girl

subject: [Coming Soon] Magia Clash!
text:
Thank you for playing Magia Record!

A new event, Magia Clash!, a crossover event with the anime movie "Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha Detonation" is scheduled to begin on 11/13.


Magia Clash!

■ Event Duration

11/13 2:00 AM to 11/24 11:59 PM PST

■ Content

This event introduces three new Magical Girls: Nanoha Takamachi, Hayate Yagami, and Fate T. Harlaown from the Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha Detonation anime movie.

subject: [Part 2 Released!]  Magia Clash!
text:
Thank you for playing Magia Record!

11/19 2:00 AM PST

Part 2 of Magia Clash! is released!


A new event, Magia Clash!, a crossover event with the anime movie "Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha Detonation" began on 11/13.

In addition, the Magia Clash! Fate Weaves are available.
>Info: [Limited Time Only] Magia Clash! Fate Weave Round 1
>Info: [Limited Time Only] Magia Clash! Fate Weave Round 2


Magia Clash!

■ Event Duration

11/13 2:00 AM to 11/24 11:59 PM PST

■ Content

This event introduces three new Magical Girls: Nanoha Takamachi, Hayate Yagami, and Fate T. Harlaown from the Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha Detonation anime movie.

Try to complete Area Missions! Area Missions can be completed by playing the area's Event Quests. These Event Quests have turn limits. Do as much as you can before the battle ends!

Additionally, you can obtain the Magical Girl Hayate Yagami (Voiced by: Kana Ueda) by playing the event.

How to Play

Choose an area on the map, and then select an Event Quest. These quests have three difficulties: Easy, Medium, and Hard. Choose the difficulty that's right for you!

You can find Victory Medals in Event Quests. Exchange these medals for limited time only items, such as Memoria, and more.

Equip the following Memoria to increase the number of Victory Medals dropped:
Gather, Shimmer of Stars...
+7 Victory Medals dropped
Resound, Horn of the End
+7 Victory Medals dropped
Blessed Wind Returns
+5 Victory Medals dropped

※Resound, Horn of the End is available in the Magia Clash! Fate Weave Round 2.

■ Limited Turn Battles

Event Quests have turn limits.
Clear the quest by reaching the turn limit, or defeating all the enemies. All difficulties of Event Quests have the same turn limit and AP cost. Higher difficulty quests have more enemies! Complete these quests to clear the Area Mission faster.

■ Area Progression

Clear any quest in an area to advance to the next area. You can also advance to the next area by clearing the Area Mission. The first five chapters of the story will be released at the beginning of the event.

※The rest of the story will be released on 11/19 at 2:00 AM PST.

■ Area Missions

Each area has its own Area Mission. Clear the Area Mission to get an Area Flag!

Area Flags can be exchanged in the Event Shop for the Magical Girl Hayate Yagami, her Destiny Gems, Awakening Materials, and Enhance Magia Materials.

※Even if you reach the turn limit or fail the quest, the number of enemies taken down or the amount of damage dealt will be added to the total needed to clear the Area Mission.

■ Boss Area

Once you clear every Area Mission in a chapter, that chapter's Boss Area will appear. Bosses have high HP, so they sometimes cannot be defeated in one attempt. If you are defeated by a boss, the amount of damage dealt during that attempt will be subtracted from the boss's Area Mission HP Gauge.

■ Defeating the Boss

Defeat Bosses for Mana!
The Mana you gather will be the key to victory...
※Mana cannot be used in the shop.

Mana


■ Event Rewards

You can also get enough Materials to fully awaken Hayate Yagami and fully enhance her Magia!

Event Shop

Exchange the Victory Medals for limited time only items, such as Memoria, and more.

Area Flags collected from Area Missions can be exchanged in the Event Shop for the Magical Girl Hayate Yagami, her Destiny Gems, Awakening Materials, and Enhance Magia Materials.

Check out the Event Shop for more details!

subject: Wait, You Got It Wrong!
text:
Thank you for playing Magia Record!

A new event, Wait, You Got It Wrong! began on 11/25.



In addition, the Wait, You Got It Wrong! Fate Weave is available.

Wait, You Got It Wrong!

■ Event Duration

11/25 2:00 AM to 12/3 11:59 PM PST

■ Content

This event has a whopping 160 quests!

During this event, your Magical Girl’s HP and MP will be carried from the previous quest.

Magic Girls who have “fallen” can be used again once a certain amount of time passes.

There are two types of quests for this event.

・Story Quests
Play through these quests to learn more about the event’s Magical Girls!

・Challenge Quests
Play these quests for an extra challenge!



How to Play

■ No Support Magical Girls

Support Magical Girls cannot be used during this event.

■ No HP/MP Recovery

Magical Girl's HP and MP will not recover between quests.
Fallen Magical Girls cannot be used in quests for a certain amount of time.

■ Reviving Magical Girls

Fallen Magical Girls can battle again once they are revived!

　・ Revive Times
　　　★1 - 30 minutes
　　　★2 - 60 minutes
　　　★3 - 90 minutes
　　　★4 - 120 minutes
　　　★5 - 120 minutes

　・ Instant Revive

You can immediately revive your Magical Girl up to 10 times per day. Your Revives will reset at 12:00 AM.


■ Boss Battle

Bosses will appear every five event quests. Bosses have high HP, so they sometimes cannot be defeated in one attempt. If you are defeated by a boss, the amount of damage dealt during that attempt will be subtracted from the boss's HP Gauge.

■ Enemies

Some quests feature certain kinds of enemy skills.

Check out the provided “Tip” before going into battle!

■ Magical Girls HP

Magical Girl's HP will be reduced when removing Memoria or Awakening but will not be reduced below 1 HP.

■ Other

・You cannot retry a quest using Magia Stones during this event.
・All Magical Girls will become “Fallen” if you give up during a quest.

Event Rewards

You can find Paint Sets in Event Quests. Exchange these Sets for limited time only items, such as a new Home Background, and more.

A total of 1350 Paint Sets can be found through the event.



Note

・The event schedule and contents are subject to change without notice.
・Limited time only items may appear in future Fate Weaves or Shops.

We appreciate your support and hope you continue to enjoy Magia Record Puella Magi Madoka Magica [Side Story]!

text:
Thank you for playing Magia Record!

A new event, Christmas at Mikazuki Villa, began on 12/4.


In addition, the Holy Mami Fate Weave is also available.
>info: [Limited Time Only] Holy Mami Fate Weave

Christmas at Mikazuki Villa

■ Event Duration

12/4 to 12/12 11:59 PM PST

■ Event Summary

During this event, you can play quests and help Iroha and the other Magical Girls prepare for a festive Christmas party.
We have also prepared more difficult Challenge Quests.

How to Play

■ Gather Christmas Cards

Play Non-Event Quests to earn Christmas Cards.
They can be obtained in any of the following quests:
　・Main Story Quests
　・Another Story Quests
　・Magical Girl Story Quests
　・Labyrinth Quests


Equip the following Memoria to increase the number of Christmas Cards dropped:

A Shower of Light


※A Shower of Light is available in the Event Shop.

■ Play Christmas at Mikazuki Villa Event Quests

Use Christmas Cards to play Event Quests. You can find Santa Hats in these special Event Quests.
※Event Quests do not consume any AP.

There are 2 kinds of Event Quests

・Story Quests
Play through these quests to learn more about the Magical Girls!

・Challenge Quests
Play these quests for an extra challenge!

The more Christmas Cards you use for a quest, the more Santa Hats you can earn.

The quest release schedule can be found by tapping [Schedule] on the upper right corner of the Event page.

Santa Hats

Exchange Santa Hats for limited time only items such as a new Home Background, Christmas Tickets, and more.


■ Christmas Tickets

Christmas Tickets can be exchanged for limited time only items such as Christmas Outfits.
You can get a Christmas Ticket from the Christmas at Mikazuki Villa Event Shop and more tickets from the Holy Mami Fate Weave.

■ Destiny Bottles

16 Santa Hats can be exchanged for 1 Destiny Bottle which can be exchanged for a Destiny Gem. (Up to 25 times)

5 Destiny Bottles: Destiny Gem of any ★3 Magical Girl.
1 Destiny Bottle: Destiny Gem of any ★2 Magical Girl.

※Destiny Gems will not be displayed in the Shop if you do not have the Magical Girl.
※Some Magical Girls do not have Destiny Gems.



Note

・The event schedule and contents are subject to change without notice.
・Limited time only Outfits and Memoria may appear in future Fate Weaves or Shops.

We appreciate your support and hope you continue to enjoy Magia Record Puella Magi Madoka Magica [Side Story]!

Homura's Doppel Challenge

■ Available Starting

12/24 2:00 AM PST
※Note that there is no time limit to complete Doppel Challenge Missions.

■ Contents

There will be 21 special missions that detail the steps to unleash Homura's Doppel available. By completing them, you can obtain Materials used to Awaken Homura Akemi (Glasses), Enhance her Magia, and unleash her Doppel.

In addition, you can obtain Homura Akemi (Glasses) from Mitama's Special Training - Homura Akemi and the Bonus Ticket Campaign. Don't miss out on this chance to power up one of the stars of Magia Record, Homura Akemi!


Special Connect Skills

■ ★5 Homura Akemi (Glasses)

subject: [Coming Soon] Magia Record Anime
text:
Thank you for playing Magia Record!

The Magia Record anime is almost here!
▼Anime Official Site
https://magiarecord-animeusa.com/

New subtitled episodes will be released every Saturday!

Check out the places where you can watch below!

■ Funimation

▼Official Site
https://www.funimation.com

■ Crunchyroll

▼Official Site
https://www.crunchyroll.com

■ HIDIVE

▼Official Site
https://www.hidive.com


Synopsis

In exchange for the fulfillment of a wish, Magical Girls keep fighting, unbeknownst to the rest of the world.
But Iroha Tamaki can’t seem to remember her wish.

“When I became a Magical Girl, what did I wish for again?”

There is a gaping hole in her life.
Something important has been lost.
But she continues to fight every day, without even knowing why…

Then, a rumor begins to spread among Magical Girls.

“Magical Girls can be saved if they go to Kamihama.”

Kamihama City, the city where Magical Girls and Uwasa are gathering.
The story of Iroha Tamaki, in search of her lost wish, begins…


We appreciate your support and hope you continue to enjoy Magia Record Puella Magi Madoka Magica [Side Story]!

subject: Magia Record Anime
text:
Thank you for playing Magia Record!

The Magia Record anime is here!
▼Anime Official Site
https://magiarecord-animeusa.com/

New subtitled episodes will be released every Saturday!

Check out the places where you can watch below!

■ Funimation

▼Official Site
https://www.funimation.com

■ crunchyroll

▼Official Site
https://www.crunchyroll.com

■ HIDIVE

▼Official Site
https://www.hidive.com


Synopsis

In exchange for the fulfillment of a wish, Magical Girls keep fighting, unbeknownst to the rest of the world.
But Iroha Tamaki can’t seem to remember her wish.

“When I became a Magical Girl, what did I wish for again?”

There is a gaping hole in her life.
Something important has been lost.
But she continues to fight every day, without even knowing why…

Then, a rumor begins to spread among Magical Girls.

“Magical Girls can be saved if they go to Kamihama.”

Kamihama City, the city where Magical Girls and Uwasa are gathering.
The story of Iroha Tamaki, in search of her lost wish, begins…


We appreciate your support and hope you continue to enjoy Magia Record Puella Magi Madoka Magica [Side Story]!

subject: [Coming Soon] New Chapter Celebration!
text:
Thank you for playing Magia Record!

There will be a New Chapter Celebration to go along with the release of Main Story Chapter 8 on 1/24.

We've prepared a lot of fun bonuses during this campaign to help you advance in the game, so take advantage of this chance to progress in the story! Get double player EXP for clearing Quests, double the chance for Great and Super Success Enhancements, and more!

New Chapter Celebration

■ Duration

1/24 2:00 AM to 2/3 11:59 PM PDT

■ Content

The following Celebration Campaigns will be available.

□ 1/2 AP Cost
AP costs for Main Story Chapter 1-7 will be halved during this period!

□ Quest: Double Player EXP!
Players will be awarded double the amount of EXP from Main Story, Another Story, Magical Girl Story, and Labyrinth Quests.

□ Quest: Double Support Points!
Players will be awarded double the amount of Support Points from Main Story, Another Story, Magical Girl Story, and Labyrinth Quests.
※This increase does not apply to Support Points earned through Login Bonuses.

□ Magical Girl Enhancement: Double Great Success/Super Success Rate!
The chance for a Great or Super Success is double when Enhancing Magical Girls.

□ Special Missions
Main Story Chapter 8 will have additional Battle Clear Missions.
Clear all missions to earn a total of 50 Magia Stones.

Thank you for continuing to support Magia Record Puella Magi Madoka Magica [Side Story]!

subject: New Chapter Celebration!
text:
Thank you for playing Magia Record!

The New Chapter Celebration to go along with the release of Main Story Chapter 8 began on 1/24.

We've prepared a lot of fun bonuses during this campaign to help you advance in the game, so take advantage of this chance to progress in the story! Get double player EXP for clearing Quests, double the chance for Great and Super Success Enhancements, and more!

New Chapter Celebration

■ Duration

1/24 2:00 AM to 2/2 11:59 PM PST

■ Content

The following Celebration Campaigns will be available.

□ 1/2 AP Cost
AP costs for Main Story Chapter 1-7 will be halved during this period!

□ Quest: Double Player EXP!
Players will be awarded double the amount of EXP from Main Story, Another Story, Magical Girl Story, and Labyrinth Quests.

□ Quest: Double Support Points!
Players will be awarded double the amount of Support Points from Main Story, Another Story, Magical Girl Story, and Labyrinth Quests.
※This increase does not apply to Support Points earned through Login Bonuses.

□ Magical Girl Enhancement: Double Great Success/Super Success Rate!
The chance for a Great or Super Success is double when Enhancing Magical Girls.

□ Special Missions
Main Story Chapter 8 will have additional Battle Clear Missions.
Clear all missions to earn a total of 50 Magia Stones.

Thank you for continuing to support Magia Record Puella Magi Madoka Magica [Side Story]!

subject: Breakpoint
text:
Thank you for playing Magia Record!

A new event, Breakpoint began on 1/30.



In addition, the Mifuyu Azusa Fate Weave is available.
>info: Mifuyu Azusa Fate Weave

Breakpoint

■ Event Duration

1/30 2:00 AM to 2/9 11:59 PM PST

■ Content

This event has a whopping 150 quests!

During this event, your Magical Girls' HP and MP will be carried over from the previous quest.

Magic Girls who have “fallen” can be used again once a certain amount of time passes.

There are two types of quests for this event.

・Story Quests
Play through these quests to learn more about the event’s Magical Girls!

・Challenge Quests
Play these quests for an extra challenge!



How to Play

■ No Support Magical Girls

Support Magical Girls cannot be used during this event.

■ No HP/MP Recovery

Magical Girls' HP and MP will not recover between quests.
Fallen Magical Girls cannot be used in quests for a certain amount of time.

■ Reviving Magical Girls

Fallen Magical Girls can battle again once they are revived!

　・ Revive Times
　　　★1 - 30 minutes
　　　★2 - 60 minutes
　　　★3 - 90 minutes
　　　★4 - 120 minutes
　　　★5 - 120 minutes

　・ Instant Revive
You can immediately revive your Magical Girl up to 10 times per day. Your Revives will reset at 12:00 AM.


■ Boss Battles

Bosses will appear every five event quests. Bosses have high HP, so they sometimes cannot be defeated in one attempt. If you are defeated by a boss, the amount of damage dealt during that attempt will be subtracted from the boss's HP Gauge.

■ Enemies

Some quests feature certain kinds of enemy skills.

Check out the provided “Tip” before going into battle!

■ Magical Girl HP

Magical Girls' HP will be reduced when removing Memoria or Awakening but will not be reduced below 1 HP.

■ Other

・You cannot retry a quest using Magia Stones during this event.
・All Magical Girls will become “Fallen” if you give up during a quest.

Event Rewards

You can find Truth Fragments in Event Quests. Exchange these Fragments for limited time only items, such as a new Home Background, and more.

A total of 1250 Truth Fragments can be earned throughout the event.



Note

・The event schedule and contents are subject to change without notice.
・Limited time only items may appear in future Fate Weaves or Shops.

We appreciate your support and hope you continue to enjoy Magia Record Puella Magi Madoka Magica [Side Story]!

subject: [Coming Soon] Honey & Butter Collaboration
text:
Thank you for playing Magia Record!

We’re so excited to announce the Magia Record - English Collaboration Event with Honey & Butter!



Join us on Saturday, February 22nd, at 12:00 noon for Magia Record character macarons, giveaways, and more! You’ll also be able to leave your wish to Kyubey and fans will have a first chance to purchase new Magia Record merchandise at our pop-up shop!

How to Play

■1. Gather Chocolate Bars

Play Non-Event Quests to earn Chocolate Bars.
They can be obtained in any of the following quests:
　・Main Story Quests
　・Another Story Quests
　・Magical Girl Story Quests
　・Labyrinth Quests

Equip the following Memoria to increase the number of Chocolate Bars dropped:

Let Your Feelings Fly!

My First Homemade
Chocolate


※ My First Homemade Chocolate is available in the Event Shop.

■2. Play A la Carte Valentines Event Quests

Use Chocolate Bars to play Event Quests. You can find Magical Chocolat in these special Event Quests.
There are 2 kinds of Event Quests.
・Story Quests
Play through these quests to learn more about the Magical Girls!

・Challenge Quests
Play these quests for an extra challenge! The more Chocolate Bars you use for a quest, the more Magical Chocolat you can earn.

■3. Release Schedule

New Story Quests will be released every day! The quest release schedule can be found by tapping [Schedule] on the upper right corner of the Event page.

Magical Chocolat

Exchange Magical Chocolat for limited time only items such as a new Home Background, new outfits for Magical Girls, and more.

■ New Items added to the shop

・4 new winter outfits
・5 Fate Weave tickets
・Magical Girl Kuro
・Magical Girl Tsukasa Amane

■ Destiny Bottle

16 Magical Chocolat can be exchanged for 1 Destiny Bottle which can be exchanged for a Destiny Gem. (Up to 25 times)

5 Destiny Bottles: Destiny Gem of any ★3 Magical Girl.
1 Destiny Bottle: Destiny Gem of any ★2 Magical Girl.

※Destiny Gems will not be displayed in the Shop if you do not have the Magical Girl.
※Some Magical Girls do not have Destiny Gems.


Note

・The event schedule and contents are subject to change without notice.
・Limited time only outfits and Memoria may appear in future Fate Weaves or Shops.
