subject: Mirrors Ranking Round 2
text:
Thank you for playing Magia Record!

Mirrors Ranking Round 2 began on 2/18.

Mirrors Ranking Round 2

■ Duration

2/18 2:00 AM to 2/24 10:00 PM PST

■ Contents

Battle other players in Mirrors and shoot for a higher rank!
Earn Ranking Medals and Mirrors Coins from these special battles!
At the end of the event, you will be awarded with an emblem depending on your rank.

Mirrors Ranking Battles do not cost any AP!



■ Preliminary Round

■ Duration
2/18 2:00 AM to 2/22 11:00 PM PST

■ Contents
During the Preliminary Round, players can battle up to 10 times a day. The results of this round will decide your Class for the Final Round.

※Opponents can be changed up to 10 times every day.
※The daily limits will be reset each day of the Preliminary Round at 2:00 AM PST.
※Defending has no effect on your Ranking Points.

■ Preliminary Round Results
Day 2-4: Your current Class will be updated every day at 2:00 AM PST.
Day 5: Your final Class will be determined at 3:00 AM PST.
※While the Preliminary Round results are being calculated, players cannot play Endless Mirrors or Mirrors Ranking.
※Battles that end after 2/22 11:00 PM will not be counted in the above calculations.

■ Final Round

■ Duration
2/23 12:00 AM to 2/24 9:00 PM PST

■ Contents
During the Final Round, players will battle against other players of the same Class for Ranking Points. These Ranking Points will determine your Tier at the end of this round. Players can battle up to 20 times and change their opponents 20 times during this period.

※Ranking Points earned during the Preliminary Round will be carried over to the Final Round.
※Defending has no effect on your Ranking Points.
※If you join the Final Round without participating in the Preliminary Round you will automatically be placed in D Class.

■ Final Round Results
Your Tier will be determined at 2/24 10:00 PM PST.

If you end up in Class B or higher, you will be awarded with an emblem! This emblem will be displayed on your profile and the Friend & Support screens!




■ Ranking Point Bonus

・Performance Bonus Earn more bonus points by winning in fewer turns and using more Connect Skills!
※Only the first three uses of a Connect Skill will affect this bonus.
・Power Bonus The stronger the opponent you defeat, the more Ranking Points you receive.

・Break Chance Ranking points will increase greatly at specific battle times.



■ Event Rewards

During this event, Ranking Medals can be obtained. In addition, the number of Mirrors Coins earned will also be increased. Ranking Medals can be exchanged in the shop for Fate Weave Tickets, Memoria Circuit Cores, and more!

Note

・The event schedule and contents are subject to change without notice.
・If you close the app or lose connection while battling, the battle will count as a loss and a battle count will also be consumed. Please be sure to not close the app and use a stable connection when battling during Mirrors Ranking.
・In confirmed cases of cheating, there is a chance that the applicable player’s Ranking Points will be reset.
・Ranking Medals will not transfer to the next round of Mirrors Ranking.

We appreciate your support and hope you continue to enjoy Magia Record Puella Magi Madoka Magica [Side Story]!

　>info: Kanagi Izumi Fate Weave

Let's See What You're Maid Of

■ Event Duration

3/9 to 3/18 11:59 PM PDT

■ Event Summary

During this event, you can play quests and enjoy the story of the Magical Girl Kanagi Izumi. We have also prepared more difficult Challenge Quests.


How to Play

■ Gather 980-Yen-of-Love Parfaits

Play Non-Event Quests to earn 980-Yen-of-Love Parfaits.
They can be obtained in any of the following quests:
　・Main Story Quests
　・Another Story Quests
　・Magical Girl Story Quests
　・Labyrinth Quests

Equip the following Memoria to increase the number of 980-Yen-of-Love Parfaits dropped:

Unbridgeable Gap

The Eccentric Maid

※The Eccentric Maid is available from the Event.

■ Play Let's See What You're Maid Of Event Quests

Use 980-Yen-of-Love Parfaits to play Event Quests. You can find Nagitan Stamps in these special Event Quests.
※Event Quests do not consume any AP.

There are 2 kinds of Event Quests

・Story Quests
Play through these quests to learn more about the Magical Girls!

・Challenge Quests
Play these quests for an extra challenge!

Nagitan Stamps

Exchange Nagitan Stamps for limited time only items such as a new Home Background, Kanagi's Maid Outfit, and more.

■ Destiny Bottle

16 Nagitan Stamps can be exchanged for 1 Destiny Bottle, which can be exchanged for a Destiny Gem. (Up to 25 times)

5 Destiny Bottles: Destiny Gem of any ★3 Magical Girl.
1 Destiny Bottle: Destiny Gem of any ★2 Magical Girl.

※Destiny Gems will not be displayed in the Shop if you do not have the Magical Girl
※Some Magical Girls do not have Destiny Gems


Note

・The event schedule and contents are subject to change without notice.
・Limited time only Outfits and Memoria may appear in future Fate Weaves or Shops.

subject: [Coming Soon] New Chapter Celebration!
text:
Thank you for playing Magia Record!

There will be a New Chapter Celebration to go along with the release of Main Story Chapter 9 on 3/13.

We've prepared a lot of fun bonuses during this campaign to help you advance in the game, so take advantage of this chance to progress in the story! Get double player EXP for clearing Quests, double the chance for Great and Super Success Enhancements, and more!

New Chapter Celebration

■ Duration

3/13 1:00 AM to 3/26 11:59 PM PDT

■ Content

The following Celebration Campaigns will be available.

□ 1/2 AP Cost
AP costs for Main Story Chapter 1-8 will be halved during this period!

□ Quest: Double Player EXP!
Players will be awarded double the amount of EXP from Main Story, Another Story, Magical Girl Story, and Labyrinth Quests.

□ Quest: Double Support Points!
Players will be awarded double the amount of Support Points from Main Story, Another Story, Magical Girl Story, and Labyrinth Quests.
※This increase does not apply to Support Points earned through Login Bonuses.

□ Magical Girl Enhancement: Double Great Success/Super Success Rate!
The chance for a Great or Super Success is double when Enhancing Magical Girls.

□ Special Missions
Main Story Chapter 9 will have additional Battle Clear Missions.
Clear all missions to earn Magia Stones!

Thank you for continuing to support Magia Record Puella Magi Madoka Magica [Side Story]!

subject: It's Okay to be Clumsy
text:
Thank you for playing Magia Record!

A new event, It's Okay to be Clumsy began on 3/19.

In addition, the Riko Chiaki Fate Weave is available.
>info: Riko Chiaki Fate Weave

It's Okay to be Clumsy

■ Event Duration

3/19 to 3/29 11:59 PM PDT

■ Event Summary

Use Challenge Points (CP) to challenge different areas. Each area has various Nodes with different properties.

While challenging an area, all Magical Girl HP and MP will be shared between that area’s Nodes.

How to Play

There are two types of areas.

・Story Areas
Play through these areas to learn more about the Magical Girls!

・Challenge Areas
Play these areas for an extra challenge!

Exchange Promising Picks for limited time only items such as a new Home Background, Memoria, and more.

■ Forming a Team

Form a team of 5 Magical Girls and 2 sub members.
These 5 Magical Girls will be your main team during battles. Sub members can be swapped into battle whenever you please!

■ Areas

HP lost, and MP gained, will be carried over between the Nodes of an area.

If you lose during a battle, you can restart from the middle of that area. However, if all your main and sub members become “Fallen”, you will be forced to leave the area you are challenging.
※You will receive all earned EXP, Curse Chips, and items.

■ Nodes

There are different types of Nodes in each area.

■ Boss Battles

During a Boss Battle, Memoria Skills cannot be used from the first turn. They can be used after half the turns necessary for use have passed.

If you fail to defeat a boss, the damage dealt to that boss will not be carried over.

■ Challenge Points

1 Challenge Point will restore every hour.

In addition, CP Potions can be purchased from the event shop for 8 Promising Picks or 5 Magia Stones.
CP Potion
※This item does not carry over to the next event.

■ Reviving Magical Girls

Fallen Magical Girls can battle again once they’ve been revived!
You can revive a Magical Girl five times per day.
※Revives reset at 12:00 AM PDT.

■ Magical Girls' HP

Magical Girls' HP will be reduced when removing Memoria or Awakening but will not be reduced below 1 HP.

■ Other

・You cannot resume a quest by using Magia Stones during this event.
・All the Magical Girls you are using will become “Fallen” if you give up during a quest.

Event Shop

Exchange Promising Picks for limited time only items such as a new Home Background, Memoria, and more.

■ Memoria

A Comforting Place

subject: [Coming Soon] Main Story Campaign
text:
Thank you for playing Magia Record!

There will be a Main Story Campaign to go along with the release of Main Story Chapter 9: Part 3 on 4/13.

We've prepared a lot of fun bonuses during this campaign to help you advance in the game, so take advantage of this chance to progress in the story! Get double player EXP for clearing Quests, double the chance for Great and Super Success Enhancements, and more!

Main Story Campaign

■ Duration

4/13 2:00 AM to 4/30 11:59 PM PDT

■ Content

The following Campaigns are available.

□ 1/2 AP Cost
AP costs for Quests will be halved during this period!
※This will not apply to event quests.

□ Quest: Double Player EXP!
Players will be awarded double the amount of EXP from Main Story, Another Story, Magical Girl Story, and Labyrinth Quests.

□ Quest: Double Support Points!
Players will be awarded double the amount of Support Points from Main Story, Another Story, Magical Girl Story, and Labyrinth Quests.
※This increase does not apply to Support Points earned through Login Bonuses.

□ Magical Girl Enhancement: Double Great Success/Super Success Rate!
The chance for a Great or Super Success is double when Enhancing Magical Girls.

□ Special Missions
Special Battle Clear Missions from previous New Chapter Celebrations will be available again.
Clear all missions to earn Magia Stones!

※If you have already completed the Special Battle Clear Missions and received the reward during the previous campaigns, these missions will not be available again.

Thank you for continuing to support Magia Record Puella Magi Madoka Magica [Side Story]!

subject: Main Story Campaign
text:
Thank you for playing Magia Record!

The Main Story Campaign to go along with the release of Main Story Chapter 9: Part 3 began on 4/13.

We've prepared a lot of fun bonuses during this campaign to help you advance in the game, so take advantage of this chance to progress in the story! Get double player EXP for clearing Quests, double the chance for Great and Super Success Enhancements, and more!

Main Story Campaign

■ Duration

4/13 2:00 AM to 4/30 11:59 PM PDT

■ Content

The following Campaigns are available.

□ 1/2 AP Cost
AP costs for Quests will be halved during this period!
※This will not apply to event quests.

□ Quest: Double Player EXP!
Players will be awarded double the amount of EXP from Main Story, Another Story, Magical Girl Story, and Labyrinth Quests.

□ Quest: Double Support Points!
Players will be awarded double the amount of Support Points from Main Story, Another Story, Magical Girl Story, and Labyrinth Quests.
※This increase does not apply to Support Points earned through Login Bonuses.

□ Magical Girl Enhancement: Double Great Success/Super Success Rate!
The chance for a Great or Super Success is double when Enhancing Magical Girls.

□ Special Missions
Special Battle Clear Missions from previous New Chapter Celebrations will be available again.
Clear all missions to earn Magia Stones!

※If you have already completed the Special Battle Clear Missions and received the reward during the previous campaigns, these missions will not be available again.

Thank you for continuing to support Magia Record Puella Magi Madoka Magica [Side Story]!

text:
Thank you for playing Magia Record!

This event's story is written by Gekidan InuCurry (Doroinu)!

In addition, the Nagisa Momoe Fate Weave is available.
　>info: [Limited Time Only] Nagisa Momoe Fate Weave

Nagisa's Wish

■ Event Duration

4/13 to 4/21 11:59 PM PDT

■ Event Summary

During this event, you can play quests and enjoy the story of the Magical Girl Nagisa Momoe. We have also prepared more difficult Challenge Quests.

How to Play

■ Gather Train Tickets

Play Non-Event Quests to earn Train Tickets.
They can be obtained in any of the following quests:
　・Main Story Quests
　・Another Story Quests
　・Magical Girl Story Quests
　・Labyrinth Quests

Equip the following Memoria to increase the number of Train Tickets dropped:


I Will Solve the Problem!
+7 to any Train Ticket drop

Crossing the Line
+3 to any Train Ticket drop

※These Memoria generate the above additional Train Ticket drops at their fourth-Ascended state. Un-Ascended Memoria generate fewer additional drops.



■ Play Nagisa's Wish Event Quests

Use Train Tickets to play Event Quests. You can find Get Well Cheese in these special Event Quests.
※Event Quests do not consume any AP.

There are 2 types of Event Quests

・Story Quests
Play through these quests to learn more about the Magical Girls!

・Challenge Quests
Play these quests for an extra challenge!

Get Well Cheese

Exchange Get Well Cheese for limited time only items such as a new Home Background, Destiny Bottles, and more.

■ Destiny Bottles

16 Get Well Cheeses can be exchanged for 1 Destiny Bottle, which can be exchanged for a Destiny Gem. (Up to 25 times)

5 Destiny Bottles: Destiny Gem of any ★3 Magical Girl.
1 Destiny Bottle: Destiny Gem of any ★2 Magical Girl.

※Destiny Gems will not be displayed in the Shop if you do not have the Magical Girl

Note

・The event schedule and contents are subject to change without notice.
・Limited time only Memoria may appear in future Fate Weaves or Shops.

We appreciate your support and hope you continue to enjoy Magia Record Puella Magi Madoka Magica [Side Story]!

subject: Wings in the Wind
text:
Thank you for playing Magia Record!

A new event, Wings in the Wind, began on 4/22.

In addition, the Ikumi & Ryo Fate Weave is available.
>info: Ikumi & Ryo Fate Weave

Wings in the Wind

■ Event Duration

4/22 2:00 AM to 4/30 11:59 PM PDT

■ Content

This event has a whopping 125 quests!

During this event, your Magical Girls' HP and MP will be carried over from previous quests.

Magic Girls who have “fallen” can be deployed again once a certain amount of time passes.

How to Play

There are two types of quests for this event.

・Story Quests
Play through these quests to learn more about the event’s Magical Girls!

・Challenge Quests
Play these quests for an extra challenge!

■ No Support Magical Girls

Support Magical Girls cannot be used during this event.

■ No HP/MP Recovery

Magical Girls' HP and MP will not recover between quests.
Fallen Magical Girls cannot be used in quests for a certain amount of time.

■ Reviving Magical Girls

Fallen Magical Girls can battle again once they are revived!

　・ Revive Times
　　　★1 - 30 minutes
　　　★2 - 60 minutes
　　　★3 - 90 minutes
　　　★4 - 120 minutes
　　　★5 - 120 minutes

　・ Instant Revive
You can immediately revive your Magical Girls up to 10 times per day. Your Revives will reset at 12:00 AM.

■ Boss Battles

Bosses will appear every five event quests. Bosses have high HP, so they sometimes cannot be defeated in one attempt. If you are defeated by a boss, the amount of damage dealt during that attempt will be subtracted from the boss's HP Gauge for the next attempt.

■ Enemies

Some quests feature certain kinds of enemy skills.

Check out the Tips before going into battle!

■ Magical Girl HP

Magical Girls' HP will be reduced when removing Memoria or Awakening but will not be reduced below 1 HP.

■ Other

・You cannot retry a quest using Magia Stones during this event.
・All Magical Girls will become “Fallen” if you give up during a quest.

Event Rewards

You can find Helpful Gifts in Event Quests. Exchange these Gifts for limited time only items, such as a new Home Background, Ikumi's Maid Outfit, and more.

A total of 1250 Helpful Gifts can be earned throughout the event.

Note

・The event schedule and contents are subject to change without notice.
・Limited time only items may appear in future Fate Weaves or Shops.

We appreciate your support and hope you continue to enjoy Magia Record Puella Magi Madoka Magica [Side Story]!

subject: Beachside Bonds
text:
Thank you for playing Magia Record!

A new event, Beachside Bonds began on 5/1.
This event's story is written by Gekidan InuCurry (Doroinu)!

In addition, the Beachside Bonds Fate Weave is available.
>info: [Limited Time Only] Beachside Bonds Fate Weave


Beachside Bonds

■ Event Duration

5/1 to 5/10 11:59 PM PDT

■ Event Summary

During this event, you can play quests and enjoy the story of the Magical Girl Homura Akemi (Swimsuit). We have also prepared more difficult Challenge Quests.


How to Play

■1. Gather Diary Pages

Play Non-Event Quests to earn Diary Pages.
They can be obtained in any of the following quests:
　・Main Story Quests
　・Another Story Quests
　・Magical Girl Story Quests
　・Labyrinth Quests

Equip the following Memoria to increase the number of Diary Pages dropped:

Head to Toe
+7 to any Diary Page drop

The Smash Hit of the Summer?!
+3 to any Diary Page drop


※These Memoria generate the above additional Diary Page drops at their fourth-Ascended state. Un-Ascended Memoria generate fewer additional drops.

■2. Play Beachside Bonds Event Quests

Use Diary Pages to play Event Quests. You can find Summer Memories in these special Event Quests.
※Event Quests do not consume any AP.

There are 2 types of Event Quests

・Story Quests
Play through these quests to learn more about the Magical Girls!
・Challenge Quests
Play these quests for an extra challenge!

Summer Memories

Exchange Summer Memories for limited time only items such as new Home Backgrounds, Beachside Tickets, Destiny Bottles, and more.

■ Beachside Tickets

Exchange Beachside Tickets for Swimsuit Outfits, Rainbow Orbs, and more!

※ You can get two Beachside Tickets from this event.
※ You can get more Beachside Tickets from the Beachside Bonds Fate Weave.
※ Beachside Tickets will expire on 5/15 at 11:59 PM PDT.

■ Destiny Bottles

16 Summer Memories can be exchanged for 1 Destiny Bottle, which can be exchanged for a Destiny Gem. (Up to 25 times)

5 Destiny Bottles: Destiny Gem of any ★3 Magical Girl.
1 Destiny Bottle: Destiny Gem of any ★2 Magical Girl.

※Destiny Gems will not be displayed in the Shop if you do not have the Magical Girl


Note

・The event schedule and contents are subject to change without notice.
・Limited time only Memoria may appear in future Fate Weaves or Shops.

We appreciate your support and hope you continue to enjoy Magia Record Puella Magi Madoka Magica [Side Story]!

subject: Mirrors Ranking Round 3
text:
Thank you for playing Magia Record!

Mirrors Ranking Round 3 began on 5/15.

Mirrors Ranking Round 3

■ Duration

5/15 2:00 AM to 5/21 10:00 PM PDT

■ Contents

Battle other players in Mirrors and shoot for a higher rank!
Earn Ranking Medals and Mirrors Coins from these special battles!
At the end of the event, you will be awarded with an emblem depending on your rank.

Mirrors Ranking Battles do not cost any AP!



■ Preliminary Round

■ Duration
5/15 2:00 AM to 5/19 11:00 PM PDT

■ Contents
During the Preliminary Round, players can battle up to 10 times a day. The results of this round will decide your Class for the Final Round.

※Opponents can be changed up to 10 times every day.
※The daily limits will be reset each day of the Preliminary Round at 2:00 AM PDT.
※Defending has no effect on your Ranking Points.

■ Preliminary Round Results
Day 2-4: Your current Class will be updated every day at 2:00 AM PDT.
Day 5: Your final Class will be determined on 5/20 at 12:00 AM PDT.
※While the Preliminary Round results are being calculated, players cannot play Endless Mirrors or Mirrors Ranking.
※Battles that end after 5/19 11:00 PM PDT will not be counted in the above calculations.

■ Final Round

■ Duration
5/20 12:00 AM to 5/21 9:00 PM PDT

■ Contents
During the Final Round, players will battle against other players of the same Class for Ranking Points. These Ranking Points will determine your Tier at the end of this round. Players can battle up to 20 times and change their opponents 20 times during this period.

※Ranking Points earned during the Preliminary Round will be carried over to the Final Round.
※Defending has no effect on your Ranking Points.
※If you join the Final Round without participating in the Preliminary Round you will automatically be placed in D Class.

■ Final Round Results
Your Tier will be determined on 5/21 at 10:00 PM PDT.

If you end up in Class B or higher, you will be awarded with an emblem! This emblem will be displayed on your profile and the Friend & Support screens!




■ Ranking Point Bonus

・Performance Bonus Earn more bonus points by winning in fewer turns and using more Connect Skills!
※Only the first three uses of a Connect Skill will affect this bonus.

・Power Bonus The stronger the opponent you defeat, the more Ranking Points you receive.

・Break Chance Ranking points will increase greatly at specific battle times.



■ Event Rewards

During this event, Ranking Medals can be obtained. In addition, the number of Mirrors Coins earned will also be increased. Ranking Medals can be exchanged in the shop for Fate Weave Tickets, Memoria Circuit Cores, and more!

Note

・The event schedule and contents are subject to change without notice.
・If you close the app or lose connection while battling, the battle will count as a loss and a battle count will also be consumed. Please be sure to not close the app and use a stable connection when battling during Mirrors Ranking.
・In confirmed cases of cheating, there is a chance that the applicable player’s Ranking Points will be reset.
・Ranking Medals will not transfer to the next round of Mirrors Ranking.

We appreciate your support and hope you continue to enjoy Magia Record Puella Magi Madoka Magica [Side Story]!

text:
Thank you for playing Magia Record!

A new event, Summer With Mikazuki Villa began on 6/2.

In addition, the Summer With Mikazuki Villa Fate Weave is available.

>Info: [Limited Time Only] Summer With Mikazuki Villa Fate Weave


Summer With Mikazuki Villa

■ Event Duration

6/2 2:00 AM to 6/14 11:59 PM PDT

■ Content

Spend AP to play the special Event Quests!

As you advance through the Event Quests, you will occasionally come across branches in the story. The choices you make during the event will determine how the story progresses!

Make the correct choices to find the real ending!

How to Play

Spend AP to play the special Event Quests!
As you play, you'll acquire Red Memory Shells and Blue Memory Shells. These can be exchanged for awesome items in the Event Shop!

【Part 1 Drop】
Red Memory Shell
【Part 2 Drop】
Blue Memory Shell

As you complete Event Quests, Magical Girl Fragments may drop. These Fragments are necessary for unlocking Quests.

【Part 1 Drop】
Iroha Fragment
【Part 2 Drop】
Yachiyo Fragment

Equip the following Memoria to increase the number of Memory Shells dropped:

Iroha Hits the Beach
＋7 to any Memory Shell drop

The Treasure's Right Here
＋2 to any Memory Shell drop

※These Memoria generate the above additional Memory Shell drops at their fourth-Ascended state. Un-Ascended Memoria generate fewer additional drops.

■ Part 1 and Part 2

This event is divided into two parts.
Part 2 is scheduled to begin following the maintenance on 6/8.
※In order to play Part 2, you must first clear Part 1.
※Part 1 Quests will be available even after Part 2 begins.

Event Shop

Exchange Red/Blue Memory Shells for limited time only items such as a new Home Background, Summer Tickets, Memoria, and more.

■ Summer Tickets

Exchange Summer Tickets for Swimsuit Outfits, Rainbow Orbs, and more!


Note

・The event schedule and contents are subject to change without notice.
・The limited time only Memoria and items may appear in future Fate Weaves or Shops.

subject: [Coming Soon] The Last Magia Campaign
text:
Thank you for playing Magia Record!

The Last Magia, a Main Story event connected to Chapter 10 is coming soon!

In order to join in the event The Last Magia at the end of Chapter 10, players are required to finish Main Story Chapter 10 Episode 4.

To help players reach this point, we will be offering The Last Magia Campaign!

The Last Magia Campaign

■ Duration

6/5 2:00 AM to 6/24 11:59 PM PDT

■ Contents

1. Double Player EXP and Support Points!
Players will be awarded double the amount of EXP and Support Points from Main Story, Another Story, Magical Girl Story, and Labyrinth Quests.
※This increase does not apply to Support Points earned through Login Bonuses.

2. Magical Girl Enhancement: Double Great Success/Super Success Rate!
The chance for a Great or Super Success is double when Enhancing Magical Girls.

3. Main Story: 1/2 AP Cost
AP costs for Quests in Main Story Chapters 1-9 will be halved during this period!
※This will not apply to event quests.

4. Special Mission
A new special Battle Clear Mission will be added for Main Story Chapter 9.
Clear Chapter 9 of the Main Story for a 10x Fate Weave Ticket!

5. The Last Magia Set
To help players develop their Magical Girls, we will be offering a special bundle that includes Last Magia Tickets, among many other items, for 50 Magia Stones in Mitama's Magia Stone Shop!
×75

Last Magia Ticket

×10

Master Gem ++

×50000

Curse Chip


Last Magia Tickets can be exchanged for items such as Rainbow Orbs, Enhance Materials, Memoria Circuit Cores, and more!


6. The Last Magia Login Bonus
Starting from 6/15, in addition to the regular Login Bonus, log in to receive the following items.
×5

Magia Stone

×3

AP Potion


Note

・The schedule and contents are subject to change without notice.

We appreciate your support and hope you continue to enjoy Magia Record Puella Magi Madoka Magica [Side Story]!

subject: Mitama's Special Training - Iroha Tamaki
text:
Thank you for playing Magia Record!

Mitama's Special Training - Iroha Tamaki began on 6/15.

You can collect Iroha Potions by playing through the Mitama's Special Training event.

Iroha Potions can be exchanged in the Event Shop for items that can be used to power up or Awaken your Magical Girls.

Play Mitama's Special Training with Iroha Tamaki on your team to receive bonus EXP and Episode Points.

Don't miss out on this chance to power up one of the stars of Magia Record, Iroha Tamaki!

Mitama's Special Training - Iroha Tamaki

■ Duration

6/15 2:00 AM to 6/18 11:59 PM PDT

■ Content

The following Event Quests will be playable during this event.
□ Mitama's Special Training <Enhance>
・A Quest that awards Bonus EXP to the Magical Girls in training.
・The Magical Girls in training will not receive Bonus Episode Points.

□ Mitama's Special Training <Episode>
・A Quest that awards Bonus Episode Points to the Magical Girls in training.
・The Magical Girls in training will not receive Bonus EXP.

□ Mitama's Special Training <Extra>
・Play these Quests for an extra challenge!

Shop (Mitama's Special Training - Iroha Tamaki)

■ Duration

6/15 2:00 AM to 6/23 11:59 PM PDT

■ Content

You can exchange Iroha Potions for the following items.

Fate Weave Ticket

Rainbow Orb

AP Potions, Light Orbs, and more are also available.

Note

・ Potions cannot be used once the Event Shop has closed. Please be sure to use all your Potions while the Event Shop is still open.
・ All unused Potions will be lost once the event ends.
・ The event schedule and contents are subject to change without notice.

subject: [Coming Soon] The Last Magia
text:
Thank you for playing Magia Record!

The Last Magia is scheduled to begin on 6/25!


Last Magia

■ Duration

6/25 2:00 AM to 6/28 11:59 PM PDT

■ Contents

Make your way through each area and work with other players to defeat Walpurgisnacht!

Main Story Chapter 10 Episode 5’s story will progress throughout the event.

※Players are required to finish Main Story Chapter 10 Episode 4 in order to participate in this event.

How to Play

Deal damage to Walpurgisnacht by clearing Quest Battles!

Walpurgisnacht gets stronger each time you move from one area to another!
The more you defeat Walpurgisnacht, the stronger it gets!
Fight together with other players and save Kamihama!

■ Boss Battles

Spend AP to battle Walpurgisnacht.

During the event there are two types of battles.

During normal battles all players will work together to take on Walpurgisnacht.
During the Final Battle you will be the one to finish off Walpurgisnacht!

As you fight the Boss Battles, you'll acquire Earnest Prayers.
These can be exchanged for awesome items in the Event Shop!

■ Support Comments

Send Support Comments to players fighting in the same area.
Sending Support Comments will boost your attack during Boss Battles!
※This boost will only apply to the area in which the message was sent.
※After moving to another area, you can gain this buff again by sending a new message.

Event Shop

Exchange Earnest Prayers for items such as Rainbow Orb, Fate Weave Tickets, and more.

Note

・The Event Battle may end before the event duration.
・Main Story Chapter 10: Episode 5 will be available on 6/29 for players who did not participate in the event.
・The schedule and contents are subject to change without notice.

We appreciate your support and hope you continue to enjoy Magia Record Puella Magi Madoka Magica [Side Story]!

subject: The Last Magia
text:
Thank you for playing Magia Record!

The Last Magia has begun!


Last Magia

■ Duration

6/25 2:00 AM to 6/28 11:59 PM PDT

■ Contents

Make your way through each area and work with other players to defeat Walpurgisnacht!

Main Story Chapter 10 Episode 5’s story will progress throughout the event.

※Players are required to finish Main Story Chapter 10 Episode 4 in order to participate in this event.

How to Play

Deal damage to Walpurgisnacht by clearing Quest Battles!

Walpurgisnacht gets stronger each time you move from one area to another!
The more you defeat Walpurgisnacht, the stronger it gets!
Fight together with other players and save Kamihama!

■ Boss Battles

Spend AP to battle Walpurgisnacht.

During the event there are two types of battles.

During normal battles all players will work together to take on Walpurgisnacht.
During the Final Battle you will be the one to finish off Walpurgisnacht!

As you fight the Boss Battles, you'll acquire Earnest Prayers.
These can be exchanged for awesome items in the Event Shop!

■ Support Comments

Send Support Comments to players fighting in the same area.
Sending Support Comments will boost your attack during Boss Battles!
※This boost will only apply to the area in which the message was sent.
※After moving to another area, you can gain this buff again by sending a new message.

Event Shop

Exchange Earnest Prayers for items such as Rainbow Orb, Fate Weave Tickets, and more.

Note

・The Event Battle may end before the event duration.
・Main Story Chapter 10: Episode 5 will be available on 6/29 for players who did not participate in the event.
・The schedule and contents are subject to change without notice.

We appreciate your support and hope you continue to enjoy Magia Record Puella Magi Madoka Magica [Side Story]!

subject: Regarding the Issues on 6/25
text:
Thank you for playing Magia Record!

In order to fix an issue that was affecting android players' Magia Stone Shops, we performed an Emergency Maintenance on 6/25 from 2:09 AM to 2:15 AM PDT.

In addition, due to heavy server access, some players were unable able to play The Last Magia from 2:30 to 3:00 AM PDT.

These issues have since been fixed.

We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience that these have caused.

As an apology, we will send 25 Magia Stones to all players who cleared Chapter 1 Episode 2 Battle 2 of the Main Story before 12:00 AM PDT on 6/29.

We appreciate your support and hope you continue to enjoy Magia Record Puella Magi Madoka Magica [Side Story]!

subject: [Update] Regarding the Choose Your Own ★4 Fate Weave Ticket
text:
Thank you for playing Magia Record!

It has come to our attention that the announcement regarding the Choose Your Own ★4 Fate Weave Ticket was not completely accurate.

Although the phrase "Any ★4 Magical Girl from the Premium Fate Weave can be selected." was included in the announcement, not all of the Magical Girls from the Premium Fate Weave were included.

As an apology, we have added the following Magical Girls to the applicable Fate Weave.

・Ikumi Makino
・Nemu Hiiragi
・Sayuki Fumino
・Touka Satomi

Updated 6/27 1:15 AM PDT

If you have already used your Fate Weave Ticket before 6/25 9:15 PM PDT and wish to exchange said ticket for one of the 4 Magical Girls listed above, please contact the support team with the following information.

1. Player Name
2. Player ID
3. What device you’re using
3. When you approximately used your ticket
4. Which Magical Girl you’d like

We will then exchange the Magical Girl you previously chose for a new Choose Your Own ★4 Fate Weave Ticket.

As an additional apology, we will send 25 Magia Stones to all players who purchased the applicable Deluxe Set before this issue was addressed during the next maintenance.

Updated 7/3 3:20 AM PDT

All requests for exchanges must be made before 7/5 12:00 AM PDT.

We will be performing all exchanges during our next maintenance on 7/7 at 12:00 AM PDT.

Before the start of this maintenance, we ask that you remove the Magical Girl you exchanged for your Choose Your Own★4 Magical Girl Ticket from all Quest/Support/Mirrors Teams. If she is selected as your Favorite, please deselect her as well.

We can only exchange Magical Girls that are not part of any Team or selected as Favorites.

Please be careful to perform both of these steps before the start of this maintenance.

We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience that these have caused.

We appreciate your support and hope you continue to enjoy Magia Record Puella Magi Madoka Magica [Side Story]!

■ Event Duration

7/7 to 7/14 11:59 PM PDT

■ Event Summary

During this event, you can play quests and enjoy the story of the new Magical Girl Ui Tamaki. We have also prepared more difficult Challenge Quests.

How to Play

■1. Gather Training Calendars

Play Non-Event Quests to earn Training Calendars.
They can be obtained in any of the following quests:
　・Main Story Quests
　・Another Story Quests
　・Magical Girl Story Quests
　・Labyrinth Quests

Equip the following Memoria to increase the number of Training Calendars dropped:

The World Is Full of Wishes
+7 to any Training Calendar drop

I Wonder What I'll Become
+7 to any Training Calendar drop

Determination for the Future
+5 to any Training Calendar drop


※These Memoria generate the above additional Training Calendars at their fourth-Ascended state. Un-Ascended Memoria generate fewer additional drops.


■2. Play A Fledgling's First Flight Event Quests

Use Training Calendars to play Event Quests. You can find Flower Stamp s in these special Event Quests.
※Event Quests do not consume any AP.

There are 3 types of Event Quests

・Story Quests
Play through these quests to learn more about the Magical Girls!
・Challenge Quests
Play these quests for an extra challenge!
・EX Challenge Quests
Play these quests for more extra challenges!
※Flower Stamps do not drop from these quests.

subject: Rebel of a Dawnless Land
text:
Thank you for playing Magia Record!

A new event, Rebel of a Dawnless Land, began on 7/22.

In addition, the Rebel of a Dawnless Land Fate Weave is also available.
>Info: [Limited TIme Only] Rebel of a Dawnless Land Fate Weave

During this event, the story for The Maiden of Hope - Puella Magi Darc☆Magica - is available for all players to read in the Archive!

Rebel of a Dawnless Land

■ Event Duration

7/22 2:00 AM to 8/2 11:59 PM PDT

■ Content

This event introduces two new Magical Girls: Elisa Celjska and Corbeau from Puella Magi Darc☆Magica, a Madoka Magica spin-off. This story takes place in France during the Hundred Years' War.

Try to complete Area Missions! Area Missions can be completed by playing the area's Event Quests. These Event Quests have turn limits. Do as much as you can before the battle ends!

How to Play

Choose an area on the map, and then select an Event Quest. These quests have three difficulties: Easy, Medium, and Hard. Choose the difficulty that's right for you!

You can find Knight's Medals in Event Quests. Exchange these medals for limited time only items, such as a new Memoria and more.

Equip the following Memoria to increase the number of Knight's Medals dropped:

The Fiery Dragon Roars
+7 to any Knight's Medal drop
Strange Memento
+5 to any Knight's Medal drop

※These Memoria generate the above additional Knight's Medal drops at their fourth-Ascended state. Un-Ascended Memoria generate fewer additional drops.

■ Limited Turn Battles

Event Quests have turn limits.
Clear the quest by reaching the turn limit, or defeating all the enemies. All difficulties of Event Quests have the same turn limit and AP cost. Higher difficulty quests have more enemies! Complete these quests to clear the Area Mission faster.

■ Area Progression

Clear any quest in an area to advance to the next area. You can also advance to the next area by clearing the Area Mission.

■ Area Missions

Each area has its own Area Mission. Clear the Area Mission to get an Area Flag!

Area Flags can be exchanged in the Event Shop for the Magical Girl Melissa, her Destiny Gems, Awakening Materials, and Enhance Magia Materials.

■ Boss Area

Once you clear every Area Mission in a chapter, that chapter’s Boss Area will appear. Bosses have high HP, so they sometimes cannot be defeated in one attempt. If you are defeated by a boss, the amount of damage dealt during that attempt will be subtracted from the boss’s Area Mission HP Gauge.

■ Defeating the Boss

Defeat a Boss for a special item!

Fragment of True History


Event Shop

Exchange Knight's Medals for limited time only items, such as a new Home Background, Memoria, and more.

Summer Treasures

■ Event Duration

8/3 to 8/11 11:59 PM PDT

■ Event Summary

During this event, you can play quests and enjoy the story of the new Magical Girl Kyoko Sakura (Swimsuit). We have also prepared more difficult Challenge Quests.

How to Play

■1. Gather Bonfires

Play Non-Event Quests to earn Bonfires.
They can be obtained in any of the following quests:
　・Main Story Quests
　・Another Story Quests
　・Magical Girl Story Quests
　・Labyrinth Quests

Equip the following Memoria to increase the number of Bonfires dropped:
Time for a Treasure Hunt
+7 to any Bonfire drop
Freedom in the Water
+5 to any Bonfire drop
※These Memoria generate the above additional Bonfire drops at their fourth-Ascended state. Un-Ascended Memoria generate fewer additional drops.

■2. Play Summer Treasures Event Quests

Use Bonfires to play Event Quests. You can find Wooden Tablets in these special Event Quests.

There are 3 types of Event Quests
・Story Quests
Play through these quests to learn more about the Magical Girls!

・Challenge Quests
Play these quests for an extra challenge!

・EX Challenge Quests
Play these quests for more extra challenge!
　※EX Challenge Quests do not drop Bonfires


Wooden Tablets

Exchange Wooden Tablets for limited time only Home Backgrounds, Summer Tickets, Memoria, and more!

■ Summer Tickets

Exchange Summer Tickets for Swimsuit Outfits, Rainbow Orbs, and more!

■ Destiny Bottles

16 Wooden Tablets can be exchanged for 1 Destiny Bottle, which can be exchanged for a Destiny Gem. (Up to 25 times)

5 Destiny Bottles: Destiny Gem of any ★3 Magical Girl.
1 Destiny Bottle: Destiny Gem of any ★2 Magical Girl.

※Destiny Gems for Magical Girls you do not have will not be displayed in the Shop.

Note

・The event schedule and contents are subject to change without notice.
・Limited time only Memoria may appear in future Fate Weaves or Shops.

We appreciate your support and hope you continue to enjoy Magia Record Puella Magi Madoka Magica [Side Story]!

In addition, the Hanna Sarasa Fate Weave is available.
>Info: Hanna Sarasa Fate Weave
During this event, the story for And So, The Azaleas Bloom is available for all players to read in the Archive!

The Flowers' Lament

■ Event Duration

8/21 2:00 AM to 8/30 11:59 PM PDT

■ Content

Enjoy the continuation of Konoha Shizumi, Hazuki Yusa, and Ayame Mikuri’s story from And So, The Azaleas Bloom!

How to Play

Spend AP to play the special Event Quests!
As you play, you'll acquire Blooming Wreathes. These can be exchanged for awesome items in the Event Shop!

As you complete Event Quests, Fragments may drop. These Fragments are necessary for unlocking quests.

Azalea
Fragment
Camellia
Fragment
Clover
Fragment

Equip the following Memoria to increase the number of Blooming Wreaths dropped:

Our Backs Together
＋7 to any Blooming Wreath drop
We've Got This!
＋5 to any Blooming Wreath drop
※These Memoria generate the above additional Blooming Wreath drops at their fourth-Ascended state. Un-Ascended Memoria generate fewer additional drops.

■ Event Quests

There are 3 types of Event Quests

・Story Quests
Play through these quests to learn more about the Magical Girls!

・Free Quests
Play these quests for an extra challenge!

・Challenge Quests
Play these quests for an even extra challenge!
※Fragments do not drop from Challenge Quests.

■ Part 1 and Part 2

This event is divided into two parts.
Part 2 is scheduled to begin following the maintenance on 8/26.
※In order to play Part 2, you must first clear Part 1.
※Part 1 Quests will be available even after Part 2 begins.

■ Event Rewards

Advance the story and get 3 limited time only Memoria!


Event Shop

Exchange Blooming Wreaths for limited time only items such as Memoria, Fate Weave Tickets, and more.

Note

・The event schedule and contents are subject to change without notice.
・The limited time only Memoria and items may appear in future Fate Weaves or Shops.

We appreciate your support and hope you continue to enjoy Magia Record Puella Magi Madoka Magica [Side Story]!

subject: End of Service Announcement
text:
Thank you for playing Magia Record!

We regret to inform you that Magia Record - English will be ceasing all operations on 9/29 at 11:59 PM PDT. Unfortunately, after that time the game will no longer be available to download or play.

We are incredibly thankful for all the support you have given Magia Record - English since its release in June of 2019. Without you, there would be no Magia Record.

Magia Stones will still be available for purchase until 9/10 at 11:59 PM PDT.
※ Paid Magia Stones cannot be refunded. Please be sure to use all of your remaining Magia Stones before 9/29.

30 Day Magia Passes will also still be available for purchase until 8/30 at 11:59 PM PDT.

■The Remaining Schedule

※ Accounts for Magia Record - English cannot be transferred to other region’s versions.

Thank you for all of your support, and we hope you enjoy the remaining days of Magia Record - English!

subject: Mirrors Ranking Round 4
text:
Thank you for playing Magia Record!

Mirrors Ranking Round 4 began on 9/11.

Mirrors Ranking Round 4

■ Duration

9/11 2:00 AM to 9/17 10:00 PM PDT

■ Contents

Battle other players in Mirrors and shoot for a higher rank!
Earn Ranking Medals and Mirrors Coins from these special battles!
At the end of the event, you will be awarded with an emblem depending on your rank.

Mirrors Ranking Battles do not cost any AP!



■ Preliminary Round

■ Duration
9/11 2:00 AM to 9/15 11:00 PM PDT

■ Contents
During the Preliminary Round, players can battle up to 10 times a day. The results of this round will decide your Class for the Final Round.

※Opponents can be changed up to 10 times every day.
※The daily limits will be reset each day of the Preliminary Round at 2:00 AM PDT.
※Defending has no effect on your Ranking Points.

■ Preliminary Round Results
Day 2-4: Your current Class will be updated every day at 2:00 AM PDT.
Day 5: Your final Class will be determined on 9/16 at 12:00 AM PDT.
※While the Preliminary Round results are being calculated, players cannot play Endless Mirrors or Mirrors Ranking.
※Battles that end after 9/15 11:00 PM PDT will not be counted in the above calculations.

■ Final Round

■ Duration
9/16 12:00 AM to 9/17 9:00 PM PDT

■ Contents
During the Final Round, players will battle against other players of the same Class for Ranking Points. These Ranking Points will determine your Tier at the end of this round. Players can battle up to 20 times and change their opponents 20 times during this period.

※Ranking Points earned during the Preliminary Round will be carried over to the Final Round.
※Defending has no effect on your Ranking Points.
※If you join the Final Round without participating in the Preliminary Round you will automatically be placed in D Class.

■ Final Round Results
Your Tier will be determined on 9/17 at 10:00 PM PDT.

If you end up in Class B or higher, you will be awarded with an emblem! This emblem will be displayed on your profile and the Friend & Support screens!




■ Ranking Point Bonus

・Performance Bonus Earn more bonus points by winning in fewer turns and using more Connect Skills!
※Only the first three uses of a Connect Skill will affect this bonus.

・Power Bonus The stronger the opponent you defeat, the more Ranking Points you receive.

・Break Chance Ranking points will increase greatly at specific battle times.



■ Event Rewards

During this event, Ranking Medals can be obtained. In addition, the number of Mirrors Coins earned will also be increased. Ranking Medals can be exchanged in the shop for Fate Weave Tickets, Memoria Circuit Cores, and more!

Note

・The event schedule and contents are subject to change without notice.
・If you close the app or lose connection while battling, the battle will count as a loss and a battle count will also be consumed. Please be sure to not close the app and use a stable connection when battling during Mirrors Ranking.
・In confirmed cases of cheating, there is a chance that the applicable player’s Ranking Points will be reset.
・Ranking Medals will not transfer to the next round of Mirrors Ranking.

We appreciate your support and hope you continue to enjoy Magia Record Puella Magi Madoka Magica [Side Story]!

subject: About Gallery Mode
text:
Thank you for playing Magia Record!

By downloading the new version of Magia Record (1.2.0), you will be able to use Gallery Mode after operations have shut down on 10/30 at 11:59 PM PDT.

■About Gallery Mode
・Gallery Mode allows you to view the Magical Girls you've unlocked in your Archive.
※You will not be able to view Live2D models or listen to voices.
・In order to view Magical Girl transformations, you will have to download all videos before operations shut down.
※Download Video Data by going to Settings→Manage Data→Video Settings.
・Gallery Mode will include the Magical Girls that you had the last time you accessed the Home Page before operations shut down.

■Prepare Your Account for Gallery Mode
・In order to use Gallery Mode, you will need to perform the following two steps before operations shut down.
1) Install version 1.2.0
2) After installing version 1.2.0, access the Home Page at least once

■Note
Players who have not performed the above two steps will not be able to access Gallery Mode once operations have shut down.

Thank you for all of your support and we hope you enjoy the remaining days of Magia Record Puella Magi Madoka Magica [Side Story]!
